projectDesc.p: SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts aims to establish a corpus of Indic texts marked up according to the guidelines of the Text Encoding Initiative (TEI).

interpretation.p: (1) Sanskrit diacritics are entered using the Unicode Standard Encoding (utf-8):
vowels and diphthongs: a, ā, i, ī, u, ū, ṛ, ṝ, ḷ, e, ai, o, au
gutturals: k, kh, g, gh, ṅ
palatals: c, ch, j, jh, ñ
cerebrals: ṭ, ṭh, ḍ, ḍh, ṇ
dentals: t, th, d, dh, n
labials: p, ph, b, bh, m
(3) Members of a compound are sometimes separated by periods.

(5) Mūla Text rearranged from Prof. Lariviere's critical edition of the text. For the details of the text of critical edition, see Prof. Lariviere's introduction. Mūla text copied from Prof. Lariviere's file for the edition of text with commentary. Critical apparatus is omitted in this version (mūla text with apparatus is also available from Yasuke Ikari).

correction.p: The text was typed, analyzed and proofread by Yasuke Ikari: March 1992.

refsDecl.p: References to each portion of the Sanskrit text have been placed at the start of each line: e.g., NM01.009c/ refers to Lariviere's edition of the Nāradasmṛti, Mātṛkā 1, Verse 9, Line 2; N01.009a/ refers to Lariviere's edition of the Nāradasmṛti, Chapter 1, Verse 9, Line 1 - Lariviere, R.W., op. cit..
Mātṛkā and chapter headings are from: Lariviere, R.W., op. cit..
Page references to Lariviere's edition of the Sanskrit text have been placed in the body of the text: e.g., -- 49 -- refers to Lariviere's edition, page 49 - Lariviere, R.W., op. cit..

Page references to Lariviere's and Jolly's English translations have been placed below and to the right of the section headings: e.g., [ L tr. 96-99 :: cf. J tr. 55-56 refers to Lariviere's translation, pages 96 to 99, and Jolly's translation, pages 55 to 56 - Lariviere, R.W. and Jolly, J., op. cit..

``J edn Mā'' refers to the Prolegomena in: Jolly, J., editor, Nāradasmṛtiḥ, (Calcutta: Asiatic Society of Bengal, 1885-86) Bibliotheca Indica: a collection of oriental works, new series, nos 542, 566, 595.

lg.l: NM01.001a/ dharma.ekatānāḥ puruṣā yadāsan satyavādinaḥ |
NM01.001c/ tadā na vyavahāro 'bhūn na dveṣo nāpi matsaraḥ || 1 ||
NM01.002a/ naṣṭe dharme manuṣyeṣu vyavahāraḥ pravartate |
NM01.002c/ draṣṭā ca vyavahārāṇāṁ rājā daṇḍadharaḥ kṛtaḥ || 2 ||
NM01.003a/ likhitaṁ sākṣiṇaś cātra dvau vidhī samprakīrtitau |
NM01.003c/ sandigdhārthaviśuddhyarthaṁ dvayor vivadamānayoḥ || 3 ||
NM01.004a/ sottaro 'nuttaraś caiva sa vijñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ |
NM01.004c/ sottaro 'bhyadhiko yatra vilekhāpūrvakaḥ paṇaḥ || 4 ||
NM01.005a/ vivāde sottarapaṇe dvayor yas tatra hīyate |
NM01.005c/ sa paṇaṁ svakṛtaṁ dāpyo vinayaṁ ca parājaye || 5 ||
NM01.006a/ sāras tu vyavahārāṇāṁ pratijñā samudāhṛtā |
NM01.006c/ taddhānau hīyate vādī taraṁs tām uttaro bhavet || 6 ||
NM01.007a/ kulāni śreṇayaś caiva gaṇāś cādhikṛto nṛpaḥ |
NM01.007c/ pratiṣṭhā vyavahārāṇāṁ gurvebhyas tūttarottaram || 7 ||
NM01.008a/ sa catuṣpāc catuḥsthānaś catuḥsādhana eva ca |
NM01.008c/ caturhitaś caturvyāpī catuṣkārī ca kīrtyate || 8 ||
NM01.009a/ aṣṭāṅgo 'ṣṭādaśapadaḥ śataśākhas tathā-eva ca |
NM01.009c/ triyonir dvyabhiyogaś ca dvidvāro dvigatis tathā || 9 ||
NM01.010a/ dharmaś ca vyavahāraś ca caritraṁ rājaśāsanam |
NM01.010c/ catuṣpād vyavahāro 'yam uttaraḥ pūrvabādhakaḥ || 10 ||
NM01.011a/ tatra satye sthito dharmo vyavahāras tu sākṣiṣu |
NM01.011c/ caritraṁ pustakaraṇe rājājñāyāṁ tu śāsanam || 11 ||
NM01.012a/ sāmādyupāyasādhyatvāc catuḥsādhana ucyate |
NM01.012c/ caturṇām āśramāṇāṁ ca rakṣaṇāt sa caturhitaḥ || 12 ||
NM01.013a/ kartṝn atho sākṣiṇaś ca sabhyān rājānam eva ca |
NM01.013c/ vyāpnoti pādaśo yasmāc caturvyāpī tataḥ smṛtaḥ || 13 ||
NM01.014a/ dharmasyārthasya yaśaso lokapaktes tathā-eva ca |
NM01.014c/ caturṇāṁ karaṇād eṣāṁ catuṣkārī prakīrtitaḥ || 14 ||
NM01.015a/ rājā sapuruṣaḥ sabhyāḥ śāstraṁ gaṇakalekhakau |
NM01.015c/ hiraṇyam agnir udakam aṣṭāṅgaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ || 15 ||
NM01.016a/ ṛṇādānaṁ hy upanidhiḥ sambhūya-utthānam eva ca |
NM01.016c/ dattasya punar ādānam aśuśrūṣābhyupetya ca || 16 ||
NM01.017a/ vetanasyānapākarma tathā-eva-asvāmivikrayaḥ |
NM01.017c/ vikrīya-asampradānaṁ ca krītvānuśaya eva ca || 17 ||
NM01.018a/ samayasyānapākarma vivādaḥ kṣetrajas tathā |
NM01.018c/ strīpuṁsayoś ca sambandho dāyabhāgo 'tha sāhasam || 18 ||
NM01.019a/ vākpāruṣyaṁ tathā-eva-uktaṁ daṇḍapāruṣyam eva ca |
NM01.019c/ dyūtaṁ prakīrṇakaṁ caiva-ity aṣṭādaśapadaḥ smṛtaḥ || 19 ||
NM01.020a/ eṣām eva prabhedo 'nyaḥ śatam aṣṭa.uttaraṁ smṛtam |
NM01.020c/ kriyābhedān manuṣyāṇāṁ śataśākho nigadyate || 20 ||
NM01.021a/ kāmāt krodhāc ca lobhāc ca tribhyo yasmāt pravartate |
NM01.021c/ triyoniḥ kīrtyate tena trayam etad vivādakṛt || 21 ||
NM01.022a/ dvyabhiyogas tu vijñeyaḥ śaṅkātattvābhiyogataḥ |
NM01.022c/ śaṅkāsatāṁ tu saṁsargāt tattvaṁ ha-ūḍhādidarśanāt || 22 ||
NM01.023a/ pakṣadvayābhisambandhād dvidvāraḥ samudāhṛtaḥ |
NM01.023c/ pūrvavādas tayoḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣas taduttaram || 23 ||
NM01.024a/ bhūtacchalānusāritvād dvigatiḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ |
NM01.024c/ bhūtaṁ tattvārthasaṁyuktaṁ pramādābhihitaṁ chalam || 24 ||
NM01.025a/ tatra śiṣṭaṁ chalaṁ rājā marṣayed dharmasādhanaḥ |
NM01.025c/ bhūtam eva prapadyeta dharmamūlā yataḥ śriyaḥ || 25 ||
NM01.026a/ dharmeṇa-uddharato rājño vyavahārān kṛtātmanaḥ |
NM01.026c/ sambhavanti guṇāḥ sapta sapta vahner ivārciṣaḥ || 26 ||
NM01.027a/ dharmaś cārthaś ca kīrtiś ca lokapaktir upagrahaḥ |
NM01.027c/ prajābhyo bahumānaś ca svarge sthānaṁ ca śāśvatam || 27 ||
NM01.028a/ tasmād dharmāsanaṁ prāpya rājā vigatamatsaraḥ |
NM01.028c/ samaḥ syāt sarvabhūteṣu bibhrad vaivasvataṁ vratam || 28 ||
NM01.029a/ dharmaśāstraṁ puraskṛtya prāḍvivākamate sthitaḥ |
NM01.029c/ samāhitamatiḥ paśyed vyavahārān anukramāt || 29 ||
NM01.030a/ āgamaḥ prathamaṁ kāryo vyavahārapadaṁ tataḥ |
NM01.030c/ vivitsā nirṇayaś caiva darśanaṁ syāc caturvidham || 30 ||
NM01.031a/ dharmaśāstrārthaśāstrābhyām avirodhena mārgataḥ |
NM01.031c/ samīkṣamāṇo nipuṇaṁ vyavahāragatiṁ nayet || 31 ||
NM01.032a/ yathā mṛgasya viddhasya vyādho mṛgapadaṁ nayet |
NM01.032c/ kakṣe śoṇitaleśena tathā dharmapadaṁ nayet || 32 ||
NM01.033a/ yatra vipratipattiḥ syād dharmaśāstrārthaśāstrayoḥ |
NM01.033c/ arthaśāstra.uktam utsṛjya dharmaśāstra.uktam ācāret || 33 ||
NM01.034a/ dharmaśāstravirodhe tu yuktiyukto 'pi dharmataḥ |
NM01.034c/ vyavahāro hi balavān dharmas tenāvahīyate || 34 ||
NM01.035a/ sūkṣmo hi bhagavān dharmaḥ parokṣo durvicāraṇaḥ |
NM01.035c/ ataḥ pratyakṣamārgeṇa vyavahāragatiṁ nayet || 35 ||
NM01.036a/ yāty acauro 'pi cauratvaṁ cauraś cāyāty acauratām |
NM01.036c/ acauraś cauratāṁ prāpto māṇḍavyo vyavahārataḥ || 36 ||
NM01.037a/ strīṣu rātrau bahir grāmād antarveśmany arātiṣu |
NM01.037c/ vyavahāraḥ kṛto 'py eṣu punaḥ kartavyatām iyāt || 37 ||
NM01.038a/ gahanatvād vivādānām asāmarthyāt smṛter api |
NM01.038c/ ṛṇādiṣu haret kālaṁ kāmaṁ tattvabubhutsayā || 38 ||
NM01.039a/ gobhūhiraṇyastrīsteyapāruṣyātyayikeṣu ca |
NM01.039c/ sāhaseṣv abhiśāpe ca sadya eva vivādayet || 39 ||
NM01.040a/ anāvedya tu yo rājñe sandigdhe 'rthe pravartate |
NM01.040c/ prasahya sa vineyaḥ syāt sa cāsyārtho na sidhyati || 40 ||
NM01.041a/ vaktavye 'rthe na tiṣṭhantam utkrāmantaṁ ca tadvacaḥ |
NM01.041c/ āsedhayed vivādārthī yāvad āhvānadarśanam || 41 ||
NM01.042a/ sthānāsedhaḥ kālakṛtaḥ pravāsāt karmaṇas tathā |
NM01.042c/ caturvidhaḥ syād āsedho nāsiddhas taṁ vilaṅghayet || 42 ||
NM01.043a/ nadīsantārakāntāradurdeśa.upaplavādiṣu |
NM01.043c/ āsiddhas taṁ parāsedham utkrāman nāparādhnuyāt || 43 ||
NM01.044a/ āsedhakāla āsiddha āsedham yo vyatikramet |
NM01.044c/ sa vineyo 'nyathā kurvann āseddhā daṇḍabhāg bhavet || 44 ||
NM01.045a/ nirveṣṭukāmo rogārto yiyakṣur vyasane sthitaḥ |
NM01.045c/ abhiyuktas tathānyena rājakārya.udyatas tathā || 45 ||
NM01.046a/ gavāṁ pracāre gopālāḥ sasyabandhe kṛṣīvalāḥ |
NM01.046c/ śilpinaḥ cāpi tatkālam āyudhīyāś ca vigrahe || 46 ||
NM01.047a/ aprāptavyavahāraś ca dūto dāna.unmukho vratī |
NM01.047c/ viṣamasthaś ca nāsedhyo na ca-enān āhvayen nṛpaḥ || 47 ||
NM01.048a/ nābhiyukto 'bhiyuñjīta tam atīrtvārtham anyataḥ |
NM01.048c/ na cābhiyuktam anyena na viddhaṁ veddhum arhati || 48 ||
NM01.049a/ yam artham abhiyuñjīta na taṁ viprakṛtiṁ nayet |
NM01.049c/ nānyat pakṣāntaraṁ gacched gacchan pūrvāt sa hīyate || 49 ||
NM01.050a/ na ca mithyābhiyuñjīta doṣo mithyābhiyoginaḥ |
NM01.050c/ yas tatra vinayaḥ proktaḥ so 'bhiyoktāram āvrajet || 50 ||
NM01.051a/ sāpadeśaṁ haran kālam abruvaṁś cāpi saṁsadi |
NM01.051c/ uktvā vaco vibruvaṁś ca hīyamānasya lakṣaṇam || 51 ||
NM01.052a/ palāyate ya āhūtaḥ prāptaś ca vivaden na yaḥ |
NM01.052c/ vineyaḥ sa bhaved rājñā hīna eva sa vādataḥ || 52 ||
NM01.053a/ nirṇiktavyavahāreṣu pramāṇam aphalaṁ bhavet |
NM01.053c/ likhitaṁ sākṣiṇo vāpi pūrvam āveditaṁ na cet || 53 ||
NM01.054a/ yathā pakveṣu dhānyeṣu niṣphalāḥ prāvṛṣo guṇāḥ |
NM01.054c/ nirṇiktavyavahārāṇāṁ pramāṇam aphalaṁ tathā || 54 ||
NM01.055a/ abhūtam apy abhihitaṁ prāptakālaṁ parīkṣyate |
NM01.055c/ yat tu pramādān na-ucyeta tad bhūtam api hīyate || 55 ||
NM01.056a/ tīritaṁ cānuśiṣṭaṁ ca yo manyeta vidharmataḥ |
NM01.056c/ dviguṇaṁ daṇḍam āsthāya tat kāryaṁ punar uddharet || 56 ||
NM01.057a/ durdṛṣṭe vyavahāre tu sabhyās taṁ daṇḍam āpnuyuḥ |
NM01.057c/ na hi jātu vinā daṇḍaṁ kaścin mārge 'vatiṣṭhate || 57 ||
NM01.058a/ rāgād ajñānato vāpi lobhād vā yo 'nyathā vadet |
NM01.058c/ sabhyo 'sabhyaḥ sa vijñeyas taṁ rājā vinayed bhṛśam || 58 ||
NM01.059a/ kintu rājñā viśeṣeṇa svadharmam anurakṣatā |
NM01.059c/ manuṣyacittavaicitryāt parīkṣyā sādhvasādhutā || 59 ||
NM01.060a/ puruṣāḥ santi ye lobhāt prabrūyuḥ sākṣyam anyathā |
NM01.060c/ santi cānye durātmānaḥ kūṭalekhyakṛto janāḥ || 60 ||
NM01.061a/ ataḥ parīkṣyam ubhayam etad rājñā viśeṣataḥ |
NM01.061c/ lekhyācāreṇa likhitaṁ sākṣyācāreṇa sākṣiṇaḥ || 61 ||
NM01.062a/ asatyāḥ satyasaṅkāśāḥ satyāś cāsatyadarśanāḥ |
NM01.062c/ dṛśyante vividhā bhāvās tasmād yuktaṁ parīkṣaṇam || 62 ||
NM01.063a/ talavad dṛśyate vyoma khadyoto havyavāḍ iva |
NM01.063c/ na talaṁ vidyate vyomni na khadyote hutāśanaḥ || 63 ||
NM01.064a/ tasmāt pratyakṣadṛṣṭo 'pi yuktam arthaḥ parīkṣitum |
NM01.064c/ parīkṣya jñāpayan arthān na dharmāt parihīyate || 64 ||
NM01.065a/ evaṁ paśyan sadā rājā vyavahārān samāhitaḥ |
NM01.065c/ vitatya-iha yaśo dīptaṁ bradhnasyāpnoti viṣṭapam || 65 ||
NM02.001a/ suniścitabalādhānas tv arthī svārthapracoditaḥ |
NM02.001c/ lekhayet pūrvapakṣaṁ tu kṛtakāryaviniścayaḥ || J edn Mā 2.1 ||
NM02.002a/ pūrvapakṣaśrutārthas tu pratyarthī tadanantaram |
NM02.002c/ pūrvapakṣārthasambandhaṁ pratipakṣaṁ niveśayet || J edn Mā 2.2 ||
NM02.003a/ śvo lekhanaṁ vā sa labhet tryahaṁ saptāham eva vā |
NM02.003c/ arthī tṛtīyapāde tu yuktaṁ sadyo dhruvaṁ jayī || J edn Mā 2.3 ||
NM02.004a/ mithyā sampratipattir vā pratyavaskandam eva vā |
NM02.004c/ prāṅnyāyavidhisādhyaṁ vā uttaraṁ syāc caturvidham || J edn Mā 2.4 ||
NM02.005a/ mithyaitan nābhijānāmi tadā tatra na sannidhiḥ |
NM02.005c/ ajātaś cāsmi tatkāla evaṁ mithyā caturvidhā || J edn Mā 2.5 ||
NM02.006a/ mithyā ca viparītaṁ ca punaḥ śabdasamāgamam |
NM02.006c/ pūrvapakṣārthasambandham uttaraṁ syāc caturvidham || J edn Mā 2.6 ||
NM02.007a/ bhāṣāyā uttaraṁ yāvat pratyarthī na niveśayet |
NM02.007c/ arthī tu lekhayet tāvad yāvad vastu vivakṣitam || J edn Mā 2.7 ||
NM02.008a/ anyārtham arthahīnaṁ ca pramāṇāgamavarjitam |
NM02.008c/ lekhyaṁ hīnādhikaṁ bhraṣṭaṁ bhāṣādoṣās tūdāhṛtāḥ || J edn Mā 2.8 ||
NM02.009a/ labdhavyaṁ yena yad yasmāt sa tat tasmād avāpnuyāt |
NM02.009c/ na tv anyo 'nyad athānyasmād ity anyārtham idaṁ tridhā || J edn Mā 2.9 ||
NM02.010a/ manasāham api dhyātas tvanmitreṇeha śatruvat |
NM02.010c/ ato 'nyathā mahākṣāntyā tvam ihāvedito mayā || J edn Mā 2.10 ||
NM02.011a/ dravyapramāṇahīnaṁ yat phalopāśrayavarjitam |
NM02.011c/ pramāṇavarjitaṁ nāma lekhyadoṣaṁ tad utsṛjet || J edn Mā 2.11 ||
NM02.012a/ āgamavarjitaṁ doṣaṁ pūrvapāde vivarjayet |
NM02.012c/ ekasya bahubhiḥ sārdhaṁ purarāṣṭravirodhakam || J edn Mā 2.12 ||
NM02.013a/ bindumātrāpadavarṇeṣv ekāvidhiṣṭayā (?) |
NM02.013c/ hīnādhikā bhaved vyarthā tāṁ yatnena vivarjayet || J edn Mā 2.13 ||
NM02.014a/ bhraṣṭaṁ tu duḥsthitaṁ yat syāj jalatailādibhir hatam |
NM02.014c/ bhāṣāyāṁ tad api spaṣṭaṁ vispaṣṭārthaṁ vivarjayet || J edn Mā 2.14 ||
NM02.015a/ satyā bhāṣā na bhavati yady api syāt pratiṣṭhitā |
NM02.015c/ bahiś ced bhraśyate dharmān niyatād vyavahārikāt || J edn Mā 2.15, Manu 8.164 ||
NM02.016a/ gandhamādanasaṁsthasya mayāsyāsīt tad arpitam |
NM02.016c/ vyavahārikadharmasya bāhyam etan na sidhyati || J edn Mā 2.16 ||
NM02.017a/ anyākṣaraniveśena anyārthagamanena ca |
NM02.017c/ ākulaṁ ca kriyādānaṁ kriyā caivākulā bhavet || J edn Mā 2.17 ||
NM02.018a/ rāgādīnāṁ yad ekena kopitaḥ karaṇe vadet |
NM02.018c/ tad ādau tu likhet sarvaṁ vādinaḥ phalakādiṣu || J edn Mā 2.18 ||
NM02.019a/ nirākulāvabodhāya dharmasthaiḥ suvicāritam |
NM02.019c/ tasmād anyad vyapohyaṁ syād vādinaḥ phalakādiṣu || J edn Mā 2.19 ||
NM02.020a/ vādibhyām abhyanujñātaṁ śeṣaṁ ca phalake sthitam |
NM02.020c/ sasākṣikaṁ likheyus te pratipattiṁ ca vādinoḥ || J edn Mā 2.20 ||
NM02.021a/ vādibhyāṁ likhitāc cheṣaṁ yat punar vādinā smṛtam |
NM02.021c/ tat pratyākalitaṁ nāma svapāde tasya likhyate || J edn Mā 2.21 ||
NM02.022a/ arthinā sanniyukto vā pratyarthiprahito 'pi vā |
NM02.022c/ yo yasyārthe vivadate tayor jayaparājayau || J edn Mā 2.22 ||
NM02.023a/ yo na bhrātā na ca pitā na putro na niyogakṛt |
NM02.023c/ parārthavādī daṇḍyaḥ syād vyavahāre 'pi vibruvan || J edn Mā 2.23 ||
NM02.024a/ pūrvavādaṁ parityajya yo 'nyam ālambate punaḥ |
NM02.024c/ vādasaṅkramaṇāj jñeyo hīnavādī sa vai naraḥ || J edn Mā 2.24 ||
NM02.025a/ sarveṣv api vivādeṣu vākchale nāpahīyate |
NM02.025c/ paśustrībhūmyṛṇādāne śāsyo 'py arthān na hīyate || J edn Mā 2.25 ||
NM02.026a/ abhiyukto 'bhiyogasya yadi kuryād apahnavam |
NM02.026c/ abhiyoktā diśed deśyaṁ pratyavaskandito na cet || J edn Mā 2.26 ||
NM02.027a/ pūrvapāde hi likhitaṁ yathākṣaram aśeṣataḥ |
NM02.027c/ arthī tṛtīyapāde tu kriyayā pratipādayet || J edn Mā 02.027 ||
NM02.028a/ kriyāpi dvividhā proktā mānuṣī daivikī tathā |
NM02.028c/ mānuṣī lekhyasākṣibhyāṁ dhaṭādir daivikī smṛtā || J edn Mā 2.28 ||
NM02.029a/ divā kṛte kāryavidhau grāmeṣu nagareṣu vā |
NM02.029c/ sambhave sākṣiṇāṁ caiva divyā na bhavati kriyā || J edn Mā 2.29 ||
NM02.030a/ araṇye nirjane rātrāv antarveśmani sāhase |
NM02.030c/ nyāsasyāpahnave caiva divyā sambhavati kriyā || J edn Mā 2.30 ||
NM02.031a/ kāraṇapratipattyā ca pūrvapakṣe virodhite |
NM02.031c/ abhiyuktena vai bhāvyaṁ vijñeyaṁ pūrvapakṣavat || J edn Mā 2.31 ||
NM02.032a/ palāyate ya āhūto maunī sākṣiparājitaḥ |
NM02.032c/ svayam abhyupapannaś ca avasannaś caturvidhaḥ || J edn Mā 2.32 ||
NM02.033a/ anyavādī kriyādveṣī na-upasthātā niruttaraḥ |
NM02.033c/ āhūtaprapalāyī ca hīnaḥ pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ || J edn Mā 2.33 ||
NM02.034a/ maṇayaḥ padmarāgādyā dīnārādi hiraṇmayam |
NM02.034c/ muktāvidrumaśaṅkhādyāḥ praduṣṭāḥ svāmigāminaḥ || J edn Mā 2.34 ||
NM02.035a/ gandhamālyam adattaṁ tu bhūṣaṇaṁ vāsa eva vā |
NM02.035c/ pādukā-iti rājā-uktaṁ tad ākrāman vadham arhati || J edn Mā 2.35 ||
NM02.036a/ paṇyamūlyaṁ bhṛtir nyāso daṇḍo yac cāvahārakam |
NM02.036c/ vṛthādānākṣikapaṇā vardhante nāvivakṣitāḥ || J edn Mā 2.36 ||
NM02.037a/ mithyābhiyogino ye syur dvijānāṁ śūdrayonayaḥ |
NM02.037c/ teṣāṁ jihvāṁ samutkṛtya rājā śūle vidhāpayet || J edn Mā 2.37 ||

NM02.038a/ ājñā lekhaḥ paṭṭakaḥ śāsanaṁ vā
ādhiḥ pattraṁ vikrayo vā krayo vā |

NM02.038c/ rājñe kuryāt pūrvam āvedanaṁ yas
tasya jñeyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ vidhijñaiḥ || J edn Mā 2.38 ||
NM02.039a/ sākṣikadūṣaṇe kāryaṁ pūrvasākṣiviśodhanam |
NM02.039c/ śuddheṣu sākṣiṣu tataḥ paścāt sākṣyaṁ viśodhayet || J edn Mā 2.39 ||
NM02.040a/ sākṣisabhyāvasannānāṁ dūṣaṇe darśanaṁ punaḥ |
NM02.040c/ svacaryāvasitānāṁ tu nāsti paunarbhavo vidhiḥ || J edn Mā 2.40 ||
NM02.041a/ svayam abhyupapanno 'pi svacaryāvasito 'pi san |
NM02.041c/ kriyāvasanno 'py arheta paraṁ sabhyāvadhāraṇam || J edn Mā 2.41 ||
NM02.042a/ pakṣān utsārya kāryas tu sabhyaiḥ kāryaviniścayaḥ |
NM02.042c/ anutsāritanirṇikte virodhaḥ pretya ceha ca || J edn Mā 02.042 ||
NM02.043a/ sabhair eva jitaḥ paścād rājñā śāsyaḥ svaśāstrataḥ |
NM02.043c/ jayine cāpi deyaṁ syād yathāvaj jayapatrakam || J edn Mā 2.43 ||
NM02.044a/ vyavahāramukhaṁ caitat pūrvam uktaṁ svayambhuvā |
NM02.044c/ mukhaśuddhau hi śuddhiḥ syād vyavahārasya nānyathā || J edn Mā 2.44 ||
NM03.001a/ nāniyuktena vaktavyaṁ vyavahāre kathañcana |
NM03.001c/ niyuktena tu vaktavyam apakṣapatitaṁ vacaḥ || 1 ||
NM03.002a/ yuktarūpaṁ bruvan sabhyo nāpnuyād dveṣakilbiṣe |
NM03.002c/ bruvāṇas tv anyathā sabhyas tad eva-ubhayam āpnuyāt || 2 ||
NM03.003a/ rājā tu dhārmikān sabhyān niyuñjyāt suparīkṣitān |
NM03.003c/ vyavahāradhuraṁ voḍhuṁ ye śaktāḥ sadgavā iva || 3 ||
NM03.004a/ dharmaśāstrārthakuśalāḥ kulīnāḥ satyavādinaḥ |
NM03.004c/ samāḥ śatrau ca mitre ca nṛpateḥ syuḥ sabhāsadaḥ || 4 ||
NM03.005a/ tatpratiṣṭhaḥ smṛto dharmo dharmamūlaś ca pārthivaḥ |
NM03.005c/ saha sadbhir ato rājā vyavahārān viśodhayet || 5 ||
NM03.006a/ śuddheṣu vyavahāreṣu śuddhiṁ yānti sabhāsadaḥ |
NM03.006c/ śuddhiś ca teṣāṁ dharmād dhi dharmam eva vadet tataḥ || 6 ||
NM03.007a/ yatra dharmo hy adharmeṇa satyaṁ yatrānṛtena ca |
NM03.007c/ hanyate prekṣamāṇānāṁ hatās tatra sabhāsadaḥ || 7 ||
NM03.008a/ viddho dharmo hy adharmeṇa sabhāṁ yatra-upatiṣṭhate |
NM03.008c/ na ced viśalyaḥ kriyate viddhās tatra sabhāsadaḥ || 8 ||
NM03.009a/ sabhā vā na praveṣṭavyā vaktavyaṁ vā samañjasam |
NM03.009c/ abruvan vibruvan vāpi naro bhavati kilbiṣī || 9 ||
NM03.010a/ ye tu sabhyāḥ sabhāṁ gatvā tūṣṇīṁ dhyāyanta āsate |
NM03.010c/ yathāprāptaṁ na bruvate sarve te 'nṛtavādinaḥ || 10 ||
NM03.011a/ pādo 'dharmasya kartāraṁ pādaḥ sākṣiṇam ṛcchati |
NM03.011c/ pādaḥ sabhāsadaḥ sarvān pādo rājānam ṛcchati || 11 ||
NM03.012a/ rājā bhavaty anenās tu mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ |
NM03.012c/ eno gacchati kartāraṁ nindārho yatra nindyate || 12 ||
NM03.013a/ andho matsyān ivāśnāti nirapekṣaḥ sakaṇṭakān |
NM03.013c/ parokṣam arthavaikalyād bhāṣate yaḥ sabhāṁ gataḥ || 13 ||
NM03.014a/ tasmāt sabhyaḥ sabhāṁ prāpya rāgadveṣavivarjitaḥ |
NM03.014c/ vacas tathāvidhaṁ brūyād yathā na narakaṁ patet || 14 ||
NM03.015a/ yathā śalyaṁ bhiṣag vidvān uddhared yantrayuktitaḥ |
NM03.015c/ prāḍvivākas tathā śalyam uddhared vyavahārataḥ || 15 ||
NM03.016a/ yatra sabhyo janaḥ sarvaḥ sādhv etad iti manyate |
NM03.016c/ sa niḥśalyo vivādaḥ syāt saśalyaḥ syād ato 'nyathā || 16 ||

NM03.017a/ na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhā
vṛddhā na te ye na vadanti dharmam |

NM03.017c/ nāsau dharmo yatra na satyam asti
na tat satyaṁ yac chalenānuviddham || 17 ||

div2.head: Chapter 1 :: Ṛṇādānam (Nonpayment of Debts)

lg.l: N01.001a/ ṛṇaṁ deyam adeyaṁ ca yena yatra yathā ca yat |
N01.001c/ dānagrahaṇadharmāc ca ṛṇādānam iti smṛtam || 1 ||
N01.002a/ pitary uparate putrā ṛṇaṁ dadyur yathāṁśataḥ |
N01.002c/ vibhaktā hy avibhaktā vā yas tām udvahate dhuram || 2 ||
N01.003a/ pitṛvyeṇāvibhaktena bhrātrā vā yad ṛṇaṁ kṛtam |
N01.003c/ mātrā vā yat kuṭumbārthe dadyus tad rikthino 'khilam || 3 ||
N01.004a/ kramād avyāhataṁ prāptaṁ putrair yan narṇam uddhṛtam |
N01.004c/ dadyuḥ paitāmahaṁ pautrās tac caturthān nivartate || 4 ||
N01.005a/ icchanti pitaraḥ putrān svārthahetor yatas tataḥ |
N01.005c/ uttamarṇādhamarṇebhyo mām ayaṁ mocayiṣyati || 5 ||
N01.006a/ ataḥ putreṇa jātena svārtham utsṛjya yatnataḥ |
N01.006c/ pitā mokṣitavya ṛṇād yathā na narakaṁ patet || 6 ||
N01.007a/ tapasvī cāgnihotrī ca ṛṇavān mriyate yadi |
N01.007c/ tapaś caivāgnihotraṁ ca sarvaṁ tad dhanināṁ dhanam || 7 ||
N01.008a/ na putrarṇaṁ pitā dadyād dadyāt putras tu paitṛkam |
N01.008c/ kāmakrodhasurādyūtaprātibhāvyakṛtaṁ vinā || 8 ||
N01.009a/ pitur eva niyogād yat kuṭumbabharaṇāya ca |
N01.009c/ kṛtaṁ vā yad ṛṇaṁ kṛcchre dadyāt putrasya tat pitā || 9 ||
N01.010a/ śiṣyāntevāsidāsastrīvaiyāvṛttyakaraiś ca yat |
N01.010c/ kuṭumbahetor utkṣiptaṁ voḍhavyaṁ tat kuṭumbinā || 10 ||
N01.011a/ nārvāg viṁśatimād varṣāt pitari proṣite sutaḥ |
N01.011c/ ṛṇaṁ dadyāt pitṛvye vā jyeṣṭhe bhrātary athāpi vā || 11 ||
N01.012a/ dāpyaḥ pararṇam eko 'pi jīvatsv adhikṛtaiḥ kṛtam |
N01.012c/ preteṣu tu na tatputraḥ pararṇaṁ dātum arhati || 12 ||
N01.013a/ na strī patikṛtaṁ dadyād ṛṇaṁ putrakṛtaṁ tathā |
N01.013c/ abhyupetād ṛte yadvā saha patyā kṛtaṁ bhavet || 13 ||
N01.014a/ dadyād aputrā vidhavā niyuktā yā mumūrṣuṇā |
N01.014c/ yo vā tadriktham ādadyād yato riktham ṛṇaṁ tataḥ || 14 ||
N01.015a/ na ca bhāryākṛtam ṛṇaṁ kathañcit patyur ābhavet |
N01.015c/ āpatkṛtād ṛte puṁsāṁ kuṭumbārtho hi vistaraḥ || 15 ||
N01.016a/ anyatra rajakavyādhagopaśauṇḍikayoṣitām |
N01.016c/ teṣāṁ tatpratyayā vṛttiḥ kuṭumbaṁ ca tadāśrayam || 16 ||
N01.017a/ putriṇī tu samutsṛjya putraṁ strī yānyam āśrayet |
N01.017c/ ṛkthaṁ tasyā haret sarvaṁ niḥsvāyāḥ putra eva tu || 17 ||
N01.018a/ yā tu sapradhanaiva strī sāpatyā cānyam āśrayet |
N01.018c/ so 'syā dadyād ṛṇaṁ bhartur utsṛjed vā tathaiva tām || 18 ||
N01.019a/ adhanasya hy aputrasya mṛtasyopaiti yaḥ striyam |
N01.019c/ ṛṇaṁ voḍhuḥ sa bhajate tad evāsya dhanaṁ smṛtam || 19 ||
N01.020a/ dhanastrīhāriputrāṇām ṛṇabhāg yo dhanaṁ haret |
N01.020c/ putro 'satoḥ strīdhaninoḥ strīhārī dhaniputrayoḥ || 20 ||
N01.021a/ uttamā svairiṇī yā syād uttamā ca punarbhuvām |
N01.021c/ ṛṇaṁ tayoḥ patikṛtaṁ dadyād yas tām upāśnute || 21 ||
N01.022a/ strīkṛtāny apramāṇāni kāryāṇy āhur anāpadi |
N01.022c/ viśeṣato gṛhakṣetradānādhamanavikrayāḥ || 22 ||
N01.023a/ etāny api pramāṇāni bhartā yady anumanyate |
N01.023c/ putraḥ patyur abhāve vā rājā vā patiputrayoḥ || 23 ||
N01.024a/ bhartrā prītena yad dattaṁ striyai tasmin mṛte 'pi tat |
N01.024c/ sā yathākāmam aśnīyād dadyād vā sthāvarād ṛte || 24 ||
N01.025a/ tathā dāsakṛtaṁ kāryam akṛtaṁ paricakṣate |
N01.025c/ anyatra svāmisandeśān na dāsaḥ prabhur ātmanaḥ || 25 ||
N01.026a/ putreṇa ca kṛtaṁ kāryaṁ yat syāt pitur anicchataḥ |
N01.026c/ tad apy akṛtam evāhur dāsaḥ putraś ca tau samau || 26 ||
N01.027a/ aprāptavyavahāraś cet svatantro 'pi hi na rṇabhāk |
N01.027c/ svātantryaṁ tu smṛtaṁ jyeṣṭhe jyaiṣṭhyaṁ guṇavayaḥkṛtam || 27 ||
N01.028a/ trayaḥ svatantrā loke 'smin rājācāryas tathaiva ca |
N01.028c/ prati prati ca varṇānāṁ sarveṣāṁ svagṛhe gṛhī || 28 ||
N01.029a/ asvatantrāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ svatantraḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ |
N01.029c/ asvatantraḥ smṛtaḥ śiṣya ācārye tu svatantratā || 29 ||
N01.030a/ asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ putrā dāsāś ca saparigrahāḥ |
N01.030c/ svatantras tatra tu gṛhī yasya yat syāt kramāgatam || 30 ||
N01.031a/ garbhasthaiḥ sadṛśo jñeya ā varṣād aṣṭamāc chiṣuḥ |
N01.031c/ bāla ā ṣoḍaśāj jñeyaḥ pogaṇḍaś cāpi śabdyate || 31 ||
N01.032a/ parato vyavahārajñaḥ svatantraḥ pitarau vinā |
N01.032c/ jīvator asvatantraḥ syāj jarayāpi samanvitaḥ || 32 ||
N01.033a/ tayor api pitā śreyān bījaprādhānyadarśanāt |
N01.033c/ abhāve bījino mātā tadabhāve tu pūrvajaḥ || 33 ||
N01.034a/ svatantrāḥ sarva evaite paratantreṣu sarvadā |
N01.034c/ anuśiṣṭau visarge ca vikraye ceśvarā matāḥ || 34 ||
N01.035a/ yad bālaḥ kurute kāryam asvatantras tathaiva ca |
N01.035c/ akṛtaṁ tad iti prāhuḥ śāstre śāstravido janāḥ || 35 ||
N01.036a/ svatantro 'pi hi yat kāryaṁ kuryād aprakṛtiṁ gataḥ |
N01.036c/ tad apy akṛtam evāhur asvatantraḥ sa hetutaḥ || 36 ||
N01.037a/ kāmakrodhābhiyuktārtabhayavyasanapīḍitāḥ |
N01.037c/ rāgadveṣaparītāś ca jñeyās tv aprakṛtiṁ gatāḥ || 37 ||
N01.038a/ kule jyeṣṭhas tathā śreṣṭhaḥ prakṛtisthaś ca yo bhavet |
N01.038c/ tatkṛtaṁ syāt kṛtaṁ kāryaṁ nāsvatantrakṛtaṁ kṛtam || 38 ||
N01.039a/ dhanamūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā yatnas tatsādhane mataḥ |
N01.039c/ rakṣaṇaṁ vardhanaṁ bhoga iti tasya vidhiḥ kramāt || 39 ||
N01.040a/ tat punas trividhaṁ jñeyaṁ śuklaṁ śabalam eva ca |
N01.040c/ kṛṣṇaṁ ca tasya vijñeyaḥ prabhedaḥ saptadhā pṛthak || 40 ||
N01.041a/ śrutaśauryatapaḥkanyāśiṣyayājyānvayāgatam |
N01.041c/ dhanaṁ saptavidhaṁ śuklam udayo 'py asya tadvidhaḥ || 41 ||
N01.042a/ kusīdakṛṣivāṇijyaśulkaśilpānuvṛttibhiḥ |
N01.042c/ kṛtopakārād āptaṁ ca śabalaṁ samudāhṛtam || 42 ||
N01.043a/ pārśvikadyūtadautyārtipratirūpakasāhasaiḥ/
N01.043c/ vyājenopārjitaṁ yac ca tat kṛṣṇaṁ samudāhṛtam || 43 ||
N01.044a/ tena krayo vikrayaś ca dānaṁ grahaṇam eva ca |
N01.044c/ vividhāś ca pravartante kriyāḥ sambhoga eva ca || 44 ||
N01.045a/ yathāvidhena dravyeṇa yatkiñcit kurute naraḥ |
N01.045c/ tathāvidham avāpnoti sa phalaṁ pretya ceha ca || 45 ||
N01.046a/ tat punar dvādaśavidhaṁ prativarṇāśrayāt smṛtam |
N01.046c/ sādhāraṇaṁ syāt trividhaṁ śeṣaṁ navavidhaṁ smṛtam || 46 ||
N01.047a/ kramāgataṁ prītidāyaḥ prāptaṁ ca saha bhāryayā |
N01.047c/ aviśeṣeṇa varṇānāṁ sarveṣāṁ trividhaṁ dhanam || 47 ||
N01.048a/ vaiśeṣikaṁ dhanaṁ jñeyaṁ brāhmaṇasya trilakṣaṇam |
N01.048c/ pratigraheṇa yallabdhaṁ yājyataḥ śiṣyatas tathā || 48 ||
N01.049a/ trividhaṁ kṣatriyasyāpi prāhur vaiśeṣikaṁ dhanam |
N01.049c/ yuddhopalabdhaṁ kāraś ca daṇḍaś ca vyavahārataḥ || 49 ||
N01.050a/ vaiśeṣikaṁ dhanaṁ jñeyaṁ vaiśyasyāpi trilakṣaṇam |
N01.050c/ kṛṣigorakṣavāṇijyaiḥ śūdrasyaibhyas tv anugrahāt || 50 ||
N01.051a/ sarveṣām eva varṇānām eṣa dharmyo dhanāgamaḥ |
N01.051c/ viparyayād adharmyaḥ syān na ced āpad garīyasī || 51 ||
N01.052a/ āpatsv anantarā vṛttir brāhmaṇasya vidhīyate |
N01.052c/ vaiśyavṛttis tataś coktā na jaghanyā kathañcana || 52 ||
N01.053a/ na kathañcana kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ karma vārṣalam |
N01.053c/ vṛṣalaḥ karma na brāhmaṁ patanīye hi te tayoḥ || 53 ||
N01.054a/ utkṛṣṭaṁ cāpakṛṣṭaṁ ca tayoḥ karma na vidyate |
N01.054c/ madhyame karmaṇī hitvā sarvasādhāraṇe hi te || 54 ||
N01.055a/ āpadaṁ brāhmaṇas tīrtvā kṣatravṛttyā hṛtair dhanaiḥ |
N01.055c/ utsṛjet kṣatravṛttiṁ tāṁ kṛtvā pāvanam ātmanaḥ || 55 ||
N01.056a/ tasyām eva tu yo vṛttau brāhmaṇo ramate rasāt |
N01.056c/ kāṇḍapṛṣṭhaś cyuto mārgāt so 'pāṅkteyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ || 56 ||
N01.057a/ vaiśyavṛttāv avikreyaṁ brāhmaṇasya payo dadhi |
N01.057c/ ghṛtaṁ madhu madhūcchiṣṭaṁ lākṣākṣārarasāsavāḥ || 57 ||
N01.058a/ māṁsaudanatilakṣaumasomapuṣpaphalapalāḥ |
N01.058c/ manuṣyaviṣaśastrāmbulavaṇāpūpavīrudhaḥ || 58 ||
N01.059a/ nīlīkauṣeyacarmāsthikutapaikaśaphā mṛdaḥ |
N01.059c/ udaśvitkeśapiṇyākaśākādyauṣadhayas tathā || 59 ||
N01.060a/ brāhmaṇasya tu vikreyaṁ śuṣkaṁ dāru tṛṇāni ca |
N01.060c/ gandhadravyairakāvetratūlamūlatuśād ṛte || 60 ||
N01.061a/ svayaṁ śīrṇaṁ ca vidalaṁ phalānāṁ badareṅgude |
N01.061c/ rajjuḥ kārpāsikaṁ sūtraṁ tac ced avikṛtaṁ bhavet || 61 ||
N01.062a/ aśaktau bheṣajasyārthe yajñahetos tathaiva ca |
N01.062c/ yady avaśyaṁ tu vikreyās tilā dhānyena tatsāmāḥ || 62 ||
N01.063a/ avikreyāṇi vikrīṇan brāhmaṇaḥ pracyutaḥ pathaḥ |
N01.063c/ mārge punar avasthāpya rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā || 63 ||

div2.note: cf. J tr. 23 :: Chapter iv. On Evidence by Writing

lg.l: N01.064a/ pramāṇāni pramāṇasthaiḥ paripālyāni yatnataḥ |
N01.064c/ sīdanti hi pramāṇāni pramāṇair avyavasthitaiḥ || 64 ||
N01.065a/ likhitaṁ sākṣiṇo bhuktiḥ pramāṇaṁ trividhaṁ smṛtaṁ |
N01.065c/ dhanasvīkaraṇe yena dhanī dhanam upāśnute || 65 ||
N01.066a/ likhitaṁ balavan nityaṁ jīvantas tv eva sākṣiṇaḥ |
N01.066c/ kālātiharaṇād bhuktir iti śāstreṣu niścayaḥ || 66 ||
N01.067a/ trividhasyāsya dṛṣṭasya pramāṇasya yathākramam |
N01.067c/ pūrvaṁ pūrvaṁ guru jñeyaṁ bhuktir ebhyo garīyasī || 67 ||
N01.068a/ vidyamāne 'pi likhite jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu |
N01.068c/ viśeṣataḥ sthāvarāṇāṁ yan na bhuktaṁ na tat sthiram || 68 ||
N01.069a/ bhujyamānān parair arthān yaḥ svān maurkhyād upekṣate |
N01.069c/ samakṣaṁ jīvato 'py asya tān bhuktiḥ kurute vaśe || 69 ||
N01.070a/ yatkiñcid daśa varṣāṇi sannidhau prekṣate dhanī |
N01.070c/ bhujyamānaṁ parais tūṣṇīṁ na sa tal labdhum arhati || 70 ||
N01.071a/ upekṣāṁ kurvatas tasya tūṣṇīṁ bhūtasya tiṣṭhataḥ |
N01.071c/ kāle 'tipanne pūrvokte vyavahāro na sidhyati || 71 ||
N01.072a/ ajaḍaś ced apogaṇḍo viṣaye cāsya bhujyate |
N01.072c/ bhuktaṁ tad vyavahāreṇa bhoktā tad dhanam arhati || 72 ||
N01.073a/ ādhiḥ sīmā bāladhanaṁ nikṣepopanidhī striyaḥ |
N01.073c/ rājasvaṁ śrotriyasvaṁ ca nopabhogena jīryate || 73 ||
N01.074a/ pratyakṣaparibhogāc ca svāmino dvidaśāḥ samāḥ |
N01.074c/ ādhyādīny api jīryante strīnarendradhanād ṛte || 74 ||
N01.075a/ strīdhanaṁ ca narendrāṇāṁ na kadācana jīryate |
N01.075c/ anāgamaṁ bhujyamānaṁ vatsarāṇāṁ śatair api || 75 ||
N01.076a/ nirbhogo yatra dṛśyeta na dṛśyetāgamaḥ kvacit |
N01.076c/ āgamaḥ kāraṇaṁ tatra na bhogas tatra kāraṇam || 76 ||
N01.077a/ anāgamaṁ bhujyate yan na tad bhogo 'tivartate |
N01.077c/ prete tu bhoktari dhanaṁ yāti tadvaṁśyabhogyatām || 77 ||
N01.078a/ āhartaivābhiyuktaḥ sann arthānām uddharet padam |
N01.078c/ bhuktir eva viśuddhiḥ syāt prāptānāṁ pitṛtaḥ kramāt || 78 ||
N01.079a/ anvāhitaṁ hṛtaṁ nyastaṁ balāvaṣṭabdhaṁ yācitam |
N01.079c/ apratyakṣaṁ ca yad bhuktaṁ ṣaḍ etāny āgamaṁ vinā || 79 ||
N01.080a/ tathārūḍhavivādasya pretasya vyavahāriṇaḥ |
N01.080c/ putreṇa so 'rthaḥ saṁśodhyo na taṁ bhogo 'tivartate || 80 ||
N01.081a/ yad vināgamam apy ūrdhvaṁ bhuktaṁ pūrvais tribhir bhavet |
N01.081c/ na tac chakyam apākartuṁ kramāt tripuruṣāgatam || 81 ||
N01.082a/ santo 'pi na pramāṇaṁ syur mṛte dhanini sākṣiṇaḥ |
N01.082c/ anyatra śrāvitaṁ yat syāt svayam āsannamṛtyunā || 82 ||
N01.083a/ na hi pratyarthini prete pramāṇaṁ sākṣiṇāṁ vacaḥ |
N01.083c/ sākṣimat karaṇaṁ tatra pramāṇaṁ syād viniścaye || 83 ||
N01.084a/ śrāvitas tv ātureṇāpi yas tv artho dharmasaṁhitaḥ |
N01.084c/ mṛte 'pi tatra sākṣī syāt ṣaṭsu cānvāhitādiṣu || 84 ||
N01.085a/ kriya rṇādiṣu sarveṣu balavaty uttarottarā |
N01.085c/ pratigrahādhikrīteṣu pūrvā pūrvā garīyasī || 85 ||
N01.086a/ sthānalābhanimittaṁ hi dānagrahaṇam iṣyate |
N01.086c/ tat kusīdam iti proktaṁ tena vṛttiḥ kusīdinām || 86 ||
N01.087a/ kāyikā kālikā caiva kāritā ca tathā smṛtā |
N01.087c/ cakravṛddhiś ca śāstreṣu tasya vṛddhiś caturvidhā || 87 ||
N01.088a/ kāyāvirodhinī śaśvat paṇapādyā tu kāyikā |
N01.088c/ pratimāsaṁ sravati yā vṛddhiḥ sā kālikā smṛtā || 88 ||
N01.089a/ vṛddhiḥ sā kāritā nāma ya rṇikena svayaṅkṛtā |
N01.089c/ vṛddher api punar vṛddhiś cakravṛddhir udāhṛtā || 89 ||
N01.090a/ ṛṇānāṁ sārvabhaumo 'yaṁ vidhir vṛddhikaraḥ smṛtaḥ |
N01.090c/ deśācāravidhis tv anyo yatra rṇam avatiṣṭhati || 90 ||
N01.091a/ dviguṇaṁ triguṇaṁ caiva tathānyasmiṁś caturguṇam |
N01.091c/ tathāṣṭaguṇam anyasmin deśe deśe 'vatiṣṭhate || 91 ||
N01.092a/ hiraṇyadhānyavastrāṇāṁ vṛddhir dvitricaturguṇā |
N01.092c/ ghṛtasyāṣṭaguṇā vṛddhiḥ strīpaśūnāṁ ca santatiḥ || 92 ||
N01.093a/ sūtrakarpāsakiṇvānāṁ trapuṣaḥ sīsakasya ca |
N01.093c/ āyudhānāṁ ca sarveṣāṁ carmaṇas tāmralohayoḥ || 93 ||
N01.094a/ anyeṣāṁ caiva sarveṣām iṣṭakānāṁ tathaiva ca |
N01.094c/ akṣayyā vṛddhir eteṣāṁ manur āha prajāpatiḥ || 94 ||
N01.095a/ tailānāṁ caiva sarveṣāṁ madyānāṁ madhusarpiṣām |
N01.095c/ vṛddhir aṣṭaguṇā jñeyā guḍasya lavaṇasya ca || 95 ||
N01.096a/ na vṛddhiḥ prītidattānāṁ syād anākāritā kvacit |
N01.096c/ anākāritam apy ūrdhvaṁ vatsarārdhād vivardhate || 96 ||
N01.097a/ eṣa vṛddhividhiḥ proktaḥ prativṛddhasya dharmataḥ |
N01.097c/ vṛddhis tu yoktā dhānyānāṁ vārdhuṣyaṁ tad udāhṛtam || 97 ||
N01.098a/ āpadaṁ nistared vaiśyaḥ kāmaṁ vārdhuṣakarmaṇā |
N01.098c/ āpatsv api hi kaṣṭāsu brāhmaṇasya na vārdhuṣam || 98 ||
N01.099a/ brāhmaṇasya tu yad deyaṁ sānvayasya na cāsti saḥ |
N01.099c/ svakulyasyāsya nivapet tadabhāve 'sya bandhuṣu || 99 ||
N01.100a/ yadā tu na svakulyāḥ syur na ca sambandhibāndhavāḥ |
N01.100c/ tadā dadyāt svajātibhyas teṣv asatsv apsu nikṣipet || 100 ||
N01.101a/ gṛhītvopagataṁ dadyād ṛṇikāyodayaṁ dhanī |
N01.101c/ adadad yācyamānas tu śeṣahānim avāpnuyāt || 101 ||
N01.102a/ lekhyaṁ dadyād ṛṇe śuddhe tadabhāve pratiśravam |
N01.102c/ dhanikarṇikayor evaṁ viśuddhiḥ syāt parasparam || 102 ||
N01.103a/ viśrambhahetū dvāv atra pratibhūr ādhir eva ca |
N01.103c/ likhitaṁ sākṣiṇaś ca dve pramāṇe vyaktikārake || 103 ||
N01.104a/ upasthānāya dānāya pratyayāya tathaiva ca |
N01.104c/ trividhaḥ pratibhūr dṛṣṭas triṣv evārtheṣu sūribhiḥ || 104 ||
N01.105a/ ṛṇiṣv apratikurvatsu pratyaye vā vivādite |
N01.105c/ pratibhūs tad ṛṇaṁ dadyād anupasthāpayaṁs tathā || 105 ||
N01.106a/ bahavaś cet pratibhuvo dadyus te 'rthaṁ yathākṛtam |
N01.106c/ arthe 'viśeṣite hy eṣu dhaninaś chandataḥ kriyā || 106 ||
N01.107a/ yaṁ cārthaṁ pratibhūr dadyād dhanikenopapīḍitaḥ |
N01.107c/ ṛṇikas taṁ pratibhuve dviguṇaṁ pratipādayet || 107 ||
N01.108a/ adhikriyata ity ādhiḥ sa vijñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ |
N01.108c/ kṛtakālopaneyaś ca yāvaddeyodyatas tathā || 108 ||
N01.109a/ sa punar dvividhaḥ prokto gopyo bhogyas tathaiva ca |
N01.109c/ pratidānaṁ tathaivāsya lābhahānir viparyaye || 109 ||
N01.110a/ pramādād dhaninas tadvad ādhau vikṛtim āgate |
N01.110c/ vinaṣṭe mūlanāśaḥ syād daivarājakṛtād ṛte || 110 ||
N01.111a/ rakṣyamāṇo 'pi yatrādhiḥ kāleneyād asāratām |
N01.111c/ ādhir anyo 'dhikartavyo deyaṁ vā dhanine dhanam || 111 ||
N01.112a/ atha śaktivihīnaḥ syād ṛṇī kālaviparyayāt |
N01.112c/ śakyaprekṣam ṛṇaṁ dāpyaḥ kāle kāle yathodayam || 112 ||
N01.113a/ śakto vā yadi daurātmyān na dadyād dhanine dhanam |
N01.113c/ rājñā dāpayitavyaḥ syād gṛhītvāṁśaṁ tu viṁśakam || 113 ||
N01.114a/ naśyed ṛṇaparīmāṇaṁ kāleneha rṇikasya cet |
N01.114c/ jātisañjñādhivāsānām āgamo lekhyataḥ smṛtaḥ || 114 ||
N01.115a/ lekhyaṁ tu dvividhaṁ jñeyaṁ svahastānyakṛtaṁ tathā |
N01.115c/ asākṣimat sākṣimac ca siddhir deśasthites tayoḥ || 115 ||
N01.116a/ deśācārāviruddhaṁ yad vyaktādhikṛtalakṣaṇam |
N01.116c/ tat pramāṇaṁ smṛtaṁ lekhyam aviluptakramākṣaram || 116 ||
N01.117a/ mattābhiyuktastrībālabalātkārakṛtaṁ ca yat |
N01.117c/ tad apramāṇakaraṇaṁ bhītopadhikṛtaṁ tathā || 117 ||
N01.118a/ mṛtāḥ syuḥ sākṣiṇo yatra dhanikarṇikalekhakāḥ |
N01.118c/ tad apy apārthaṁ likhitam ṛte tv ādheḥ sthirāśrayāt || 118 ||
N01.119a/ ādhir yo dvividhaḥ prokto jaṅgamaḥ sthāvaras tathā |
N01.119c/ siddhir atrobhayasyāsya bhogo yady asti nānyathā || 119 ||
N01.120a/ darśitaṁ pratikālaṁ yac chrāvitaṁ śrāvitaṁ ca yat |
N01.120c/ lekhyaṁ sidhyati sarvatra mṛteṣv api hi sākṣiṣu || 120 ||
N01.121a/ aśrutārtham adṛṣṭārthaṁ vyavahārārtham eva ca |
N01.121c/ na lekhyaṁ siddhim āpnoti jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu || 121 ||
N01.122a/ lekhye deśāntaranyaste dagdhe durlikhite hṛte |
N01.122c/ satas tatkālakaraṇam asato dṛṣṭadarśanam || 122 ||
N01.123a/ yasmin syāt saṁśayo lekhye bhūtābhūtakṛte kvacit |
N01.123c/ tatsvahastakriyācihnaprāptiyuktibhir uddharet || 123 ||
N01.124a/ lekhyaṁ yac cānyanāmāṅkaṁ hetvantarakṛtaṁ bhavet |
N01.124c/ vipratyaye parīkṣyaṁ tat sambandhāgamahetubhiḥ || 124 ||
N01.124-1a/ lekhyaṁ yac cānyanāmāṅkaṁ hetvantarakṛtaṁ bhavet |
N01.124-1c/ vipratyaye parīkṣyaṁ tat sambandhāgamahetubhiḥ || 124-1 ||
N01.125a/ likhitaṁ likhitenaiva sākṣimat sākṣibhir haret |
N01.125c/ sākṣibhyo likhitaṁ śreyo likhitena tu sākṣiṇaḥ || 125 ||
N01.126a/ chinnabhinnahṛtonmṛṣṭanaṣṭadurlikhiteṣu ca |
N01.126c/ kartavyam anyal lekhyaṁ syād eṣa lekhyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ || 126 ||

div2.note: cf. J tr. 32 :: Chapter v. On Evidence by Witnesses ...

lg.l: N01.127a/ sandigdheṣu tu kāryeṣu dvayor vivadamānayoḥ |
N01.127c/ dṛṣṭaśrutānubhūtatvāt sākṣibhyo vyaktidarśanam || 127 ||
N01.128a/ samakṣadarśanāt sākṣī vijñeyaḥ śrotracakṣuṣoḥ |
N01.128c/ śrotrasya yat paro brūte cakṣuṣaḥ kāyakarma yat || 128 ||
N01.129a/ ekādaśavidhaḥ sākṣī sa tu dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ |
N01.129c/ kṛtaḥ pañcavidhas teṣāṁ ṣaḍvidho 'kṛta ucyate || 129 ||
N01.130a/ likhitaḥ smāritaś caiva yadṛcchābhijña eva ca |
N01.130c/ gūḍhaś cottarasākṣī ca sākṣī pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ || 130 ||
N01.131a/ akṛtaḥ ṣaḍvidhaś cāpi sūribhiḥ parikīrtitaḥ |
N01.131c/ grāmaś ca prāḍvivākaś ca rājā ca vyavahāriṇām || 131 ||
N01.132a/ kāryeṣv abhyantaro yaḥ syād arthinā prahitaś ca yaḥ |
N01.132c/ kulaṁ kulavivādeṣu bhaveyus te 'pi sākṣiṇaḥ || 132 ||
N01.133a/ kulīnā ṛjavaḥ śuddhā janmataḥ karmato 'rthataḥ |
N01.133c/ tryavarāḥ sākṣiṇo 'nindyāḥ śucayaḥ syuḥ subuddhayaḥ || 133 ||
N01.134a/ brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā ye cāpy aninditāḥ |
N01.134c/ prativarṇaṁ bhaveyus te sarve sarveṣu vā punaḥ || 134 ||
N01.135a/ śreṇīṣu śreṇipuruṣāḥ sveṣu vargeṣu vargiṇaḥ |
N01.135c/ bahirvāsiṣu bāhyāś ca striyaḥ striṣu ca sākṣiṇaḥ || 135 ||
N01.136a/ śreṇyādiṣu tu vargeṣu kaścic ced dveṣyatām iyāt |
N01.136c/ tebhya eva na sākṣī syād dveṣṭāraḥ sarva eva te || 136 ||
N01.137a/ asākṣy api hi śāstreṣu dṛṣṭaḥ pañcavidho budhaiḥ |
N01.137c/ vacanād doṣato bhedāt svayamukter mṛtāntaraḥ || 137 ||
N01.138a/ śrotriyādyā vacanataḥ stenādyā doṣadarśanāt |
N01.138c/ bhedād vipratipattiḥ syād vivāde yatra sākṣiṇaḥ || 138 ||
N01.139a/ svayamukter anirdiṣṭaḥ svayam evaitya yo vadet |
N01.139c/ mṛtāntaro 'rthini prete mumūrṣuśrāvitād ṛte || 139 ||
N01.140a/ śrotriyās tāpasā vṛddhā ye ca pravrajitā narāḥ |
N01.140c/ asākṣiṇas te vacanān nātra hetur udāhṛtaḥ || 140 ||
N01.141a/ stenāḥ sāhasikāś caṇḍāḥ kitavā vadhakās tathā |
N01.141c/ asākṣiṇas te duṣṭatvāt teṣu satyaṁ na vidyate || 141 ||
N01.142a/ rājñā parigṛhīteṣu sākṣiṣv ekārthaniścaye |
N01.142c/ vacanaṁ yatra bhidyate te syur bhedād asākṣiṇaḥ || 142 ||
N01.143a/ anirdiṣṭas tu sākṣitve svayam evaitya yo vadet |
N01.143c/ sūcīty uktaḥ sa śāstreṣu na sa sākṣitvam arhati || 143 ||
N01.144a/ yo 'rthaḥ śrāvayitavyaḥ syāt tasminn asati cārthini |
N01.144c/ kva tad vadatu sākṣitvam ity asākṣī mṛtāntaraḥ || 144 ||
N01.144-1a/ yo 'rthaḥ śrāvayitavyaḥ syāt tasminn asati cārthini |
N01.144-1c/ kva tad vadatu sākṣitvam ity asākṣī mṛtāntaraḥ || 144-1 ||
N01.145a/ dvayor vivadator arthe dvayoḥ satsu ca sākṣiṣu |
N01.145c/ pūrvapakṣo bhaved yasya bhaveyus tasya sākṣiṇaḥ || 145 ||
N01.146a/ ādharyaṁ pūrvapakṣasya yasminn arthe vaśād bhavet |
N01.146c/ praṣṭavyāḥ sākṣiṇas tatra vivāde prativādinaḥ || 146 ||
N01.147a/ na pareṇa samuddiṣṭam upeyāt sākṣiṇaṁ rahaḥ |
N01.147c/ bhedayet taṁ na cānyena hīyetaivaṁ samācaran || 147 ||
N01.148a/ sākṣy uddiṣṭo yadi preyād gacched vāpi digantaram |
N01.148c/ tacchrotāraḥ pramāṇaṁ syuḥ pramāṇaṁ hy uttarakriyā || 148 ||
N01.149a/ sudīrgheṇāpi kālena likhitaṁ siddhim āpnuyāt |
N01.149c/ jānatā cātmanā lekhyaṁ ajānānas tu lekhayet || 149 ||
N01.150a/ siddhir uktāṣṭamād varṣāt smāritasyeha sākṣiṇaḥ |
N01.150c/ ā pañcamāt tathā siddhir yadṛcchopagatasya tu || 150 ||
N01.151a/ ā tṛtīyāt tathā varṣāt siddhir gūḍhasya sākṣiṇaḥ |
N01.151c/ ā vai saṁvatsarāt siddhiṁ vadanty uttarasākṣiṇaḥ || 151 ||
N01.152a/ athavā kālaniyamo na dṛṣṭaḥ sākṣiṇaṁ prati |
N01.152c/ smṛtyapekṣaṁ hi sākṣitvam āhuḥ śāstravido janāḥ || 152 ||
N01.153a/ yasya nopahatā puṁsaḥ smṛtiḥ śrotraṁ ca nityaśaḥ |
N01.153c/ sudīrgheṇāpi kālena sa sākṣī sākṣyam arhati || 153 ||
N01.154a/ asākṣipratyayās tv anye ṣaḍvivādāḥ prakīrtitāḥ |
N01.154c/ lakṣaṇāny eva sākṣitvaṁ eṣām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ || 154 ||
N01.155a/ ulkāhasto 'gnido jñeyaḥ śastrapāṇis tu ghātakaḥ |
N01.155c/ keśākeśigṛhītaś ca yugapat pāradārikaḥ || 155 ||
N01.156a/ kuddālapāṇir vijñeyaḥ setubhettā samīpagaḥ |
N01.156c/ tathā kuṭhārapāṇiś ca vanachettā prakīrtitaḥ || 156 ||
N01.157a/ abhyagracihno vijñeyo daṇḍapāruṣyakṛn naraḥ |
N01.157c/ asākṣipratyayā hy ete pāruṣye tu parīkṣaṇam || 157 ||
N01.158a/ kaścit kṛtvātmanaś cihnaṁ dveṣāt param upadravet |
N01.158c/ hetvarthagatisāmarthyais tatra yuktaṁ parīkṣaṇam || 158 ||
N01.159a/ nārthasambandhino nāptā na sahāyā na vairiṇaḥ |
N01.159c/ na dṛṣṭadoṣāḥ praṣṭavyāś na vyādhyārtā na dūṣitāḥ || 159 ||
N01.160a/ dāsanaikṛtikāśraddhavṛddhastrībālacākrikāḥ |
N01.160c/ mattonmattapramattārtakitavagrāmayājakāḥ || 160 ||
N01.161a/ mahāpathikasāmudravaṇikpravrajitāturāḥ |
N01.161c/ lubdhakaśrotriyācārahīnaklībakuśīlavāḥ || 161 ||
N01.162a/ nāstikavrātyadārāgnityāgino 'yājyayājakāḥ |
N01.162c/ ekasthālīsahāyāricarajñātisanābhayaḥ || 162 ||
N01.163a/ prāgdṛṣṭadoṣaśailūṣaviṣajīvyahituṇḍikāḥ |
N01.163c/ garadāgnidakīnāśaśūdrāputropapātikāḥ || a 163 ||
N01.164a/ klāntasāhasikaśrāntanirdhanāntyāvasāyinaḥ |
N01.164c/ bhinnavṛttāsamāvṛttajaḍatailikamūlikāḥ || 164 ||
N01.165a/ bhūtāviṣṭanṛpadviṣṭavarṣanakṣatrasūcakāḥ |
N01.165c/ aghaśaṁsyātmavikretṛhīnāṅgabhagavṛttayaḥ || 165 ||
N01.166a/ kunakhī śyāvadan śvitrimitradhrukśaṭhaśauṇḍikāḥ |
N01.166c/ aindrajālikalubdhograśreṇīgaṇavirodhinaḥ || 166 ||
N01.167a/ vadhakṛccitrakṛnmaṅkhaḥ patitaḥ kūṭakārakaḥ |
N01.167c/ kuhakaḥ pratyavasitas taskaro rājapūruṣaḥ | 167
N01.168a/ manuṣyaviṣaśastrāmbulavaṇāpūpavīrudhām |
N01.168c/ vikretā brāhmaṇaś caiva dvijo vārdhuṣikaś ca yaḥ || 168 ||
N01.169a/ cyutaḥ svadharmāt kulikaḥ stāvako hīnasevakaḥ |
N01.169c/ pitrā vivadamānaś ca bhedakṛc cety asākṣiṇaḥ || 169 ||
N01.170a/ asākṣiṇo ye nirdiṣṭā dāsanaikṛtikādayaḥ |
N01.170c/ kāryagauravam āsādya bhaveyus te 'pi sākṣiṇaḥ || 170 ||
N01.171a/ sāhaseṣu ca sarveṣu steyasaṅgrahaṇeṣu ca |
N01.171c/ pāruṣyayoś cāpy ubhayor na parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ || 171 ||
N01.172a/ teṣām api na bālaḥ syān naiko na strī na kūṭakṛt |
N01.172c/ na bāndhavo na cārātir brūyus te sākṣyam anyathā || 172 ||
N01.173a/ bālo 'jñānād asatyāt strī pāpābhyāsāc ca kūṭakṛt |
N01.173c/ vibrūyād bāndhavaḥ snehād vairaniryātanād ariḥ || 173 ||
N01.174a/ athavānumato yaḥ syād dvayor vivadamānayoḥ |
N01.174c/ asākṣy eko 'pi sākṣitve praṣṭavyaḥ syāt sa saṁsadi || 174 ||
N01.175a/ yas tv ātmadoṣabhinnatvād asvastha iva lakṣyate |
N01.175c/ sthānāt sthānāntaraṁ gacched ekaikaṁ copadhāvati || 175 ||
N01.176a/ kāsate 'nibhṛto 'kasmād abhīkṣṇaṁ niśvasaty api |
N01.176c/ bhūmiṁ likhati pādābhyāṁ bāhu vāso dhunoti ca || 176 ||
N01.177a/ bhidyate mukhavarṇo 'sya lalāṭaṁ svidyate tathā |
N01.177c/ śoṣam āgacchataś coṣṭhāv ūrdhvaṁ tiryak ca vīkṣate || 177 ||
N01.178a/ tvaramāṇa ivābaddham apṛṣṭo bahu bhāṣate |
N01.178c/ kūṭasākṣī sa vijñeyas taṁ pāpaṁ vinayen nṛpaḥ || 178 ||
N01.179a/ śrāvayitvā ca yo 'nyebhyaḥ sākṣitvaṁ tad vinihnute |
N01.179c/ sa vineyo bhṛśataraṁ kūṭasākṣyadhiko hi saḥ || 179 ||
N01.180a/ āhūya sākṣiṇaḥ pṛcchen niyamya śapathair bhṛśam |
N01.180c/ samastān viditācārān vijñātārthān pṛthak pṛthak || 180 ||
N01.181a/ satyena śāpayed vipraṁ kṣatriyaṁ vāhanāyudhaiḥ |
N01.181c/ gobījakāñcanair vaiśyaṁ śūdraṁ sarvais tu pātakaiḥ || 181 ||
N01.182a/ purāṇair dharmavacanaiḥ satyamāhātmyakīrtanaiḥ |
N01.182c/ anṛtasyāpavādaiś ca bhṛśam uttrāsya sākṣiṇaḥ || 182 ||
N01.183a/ nagno muṇḍaḥ kapālena bhikṣārthī kṣutpipāsitaḥ |
N01.183c/ dīnaḥ śatrugṛhaṁ gacched yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtaṁ vadet || 183 ||
N01.184a/ nagare pratiruddhaḥ san bahirdvāre bubhukṣitaḥ |
N01.184c/ amitrān bhūyaśaḥ paśyed yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtaṁ vadet || 184 ||
N01.185a/ yāṁ rātrim adhivinnā strī yāṁ caivākṣaparājitaḥ |
N01.185c/ yāṁ ca bhārābhitaptāṅgo durvivaktā sa tāṁ vaset || 185 ||
N01.186a/ sākṣī sākṣyasamuddeśe gokarṇaśithilaṁ caran |
N01.186c/ sahasraṁ vāruṇān pāśān ātmani pratimuñcati || 186 ||
N01.187a/ tasya varṣaśate pūrṇe pāśam ekaṁ pramucyate |
N01.187c/ evaṁ sa bandhanāt tasmān mucyate niyutāḥ samāḥ || 187 ||
N01.188a/ yāvato bāndhavāṁs yasmin hanti sākṣye 'nṛtaṁ vadan |
N01.188c/ tāvataḥ saṅkhyayā tasmin śṛṇu saumyānupūrvaśaḥ || 188 ||
N01.189a/ pañca paśvanṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte |
N01.189c/ śatam aśvānṛte hanti sahasraṁ puruṣānṛte || 189 ||
N01.190a/ hanti jātān ajātāṁś ca hiraṇyārthe 'nṛtaṁ vadan |
N01.190c/ sarvaṁ bhūmyanṛte hanti mā sma bhūmyanṛtaṁ vadīḥ || 190 ||
N01.191a/ ekam evādvitīyaṁ tat prāhuḥ pāvanam ātmanaḥ |
N01.191c/ satyaṁ svargasya sopānaṁ pārāvārasya naur iva || 191 ||
N01.192a/ aśvamedhasahasraṁ ca satyaṁ ca tulayā dhṛtam |
N01.192c/ aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyate || 192 ||
N01.193a/ varaṁ kūpaśatād vāpi varaṁ vāpīśatāt kratuḥ |
N01.193c/ varaṁ kratuśatāt putraḥ satyaṁ putraśatād varam || 193 ||
N01.194a/ bhūr dhārayati satyena satyenodeti bhāskaraḥ |
N01.194c/ satyena vāyuḥ pavate satyenāpaḥ sravanti ca || 194 ||
N01.195a/ satyam eva paraṁ dānaṁ satyam eva paraṁ tapaḥ |
N01.195c/ satyam eva paro dharmo lokānām iti naḥ śrutam || 195 ||
N01.196a/ satyaṁ devāḥ samāsena manuṣyās tv anṛtaṁ smṛtam |
N01.196c/ ihaiva tasya devatvaṁ yasya satye sthitā matiḥ || 196 ||
N01.197a/ satyaṁ brūhy anṛtaṁ tyaktvā satyena svargam eṣyasi |
N01.197c/ uktvānṛtaṁ mahāghoraṁ narakaṁ pratipatsyate || 197 ||
N01.198a/ nirayeṣu ca te śaśvaj jihvām utkṛtya dāruṇāḥ |
N01.198c/ asibhiḥ śātayiṣyanti balino yamakiṅkarāḥ || 198 ||
N01.199a/ śūlair bhetsyanti cākruddhāḥ krośantam aparāyaṇam |
N01.199c/ avākśirasam utkṣipya kṣepsyanty agnihradeṣu ca || 199 ||
N01.200a/ anubhūya ca duḥkhās tāś ciraṁ narakavedanāḥ |
N01.200c/ iha yāsyasy abhavyāsu gṛdhrakākādiyoniṣu || 200 ||
N01.201a/ jñātvaitān anṛte doṣāñ jñātvā satye ca sadguṇān |
N01.201c/ satyaṁ vadoddharātmānaṁ mātmānaṁ pātayiṣyasi || 201 ||
N01.202a/ na bāndhavā na suhṛdo na dhanāni mahānty api |
N01.202c/ alaṁ tārayituṁ śaktās tamasy ugre nimajjataḥ || 202 ||
N01.203a/ pitaras tv avalambante tvayi sākṣitvam āgate |
N01.203c/ tārayiṣyati kiṁvāsmān ātmānaṁ pātayiṣyati || 203 ||
N01.204a/ satyam ātmā manuṣyasya satye sarvaṁ pratiṣṭhitam |
N01.204c/ sarvathaivātmanātmānaṁ śreyasā yojayiṣyasi || 204 ||
N01.205a/ yāṁ ca rātrim ajaniṣṭhā yāṁ rātriṁ ca mariṣyasi |
N01.205c/ vṛthā tadantaraṁ te syāt kuryāś cet satyam anyathā || 205 ||
N01.206a/ nāsti satyāt paro dharmo nānṛtāt pātakaṁ param |
N01.206c/ sākṣidharme viśeṣeṇa satyam eva vadet tataḥ || 206 ||
N01.207a/ yaḥ parārthe praharati svāṁ vācaṁ puruṣādhamaḥ |
N01.207c/ ātmārthe kiṁ na kuryāt sa pāpo narakanirbhayaḥ || 207 ||
N01.208a/ arthā vai vāci niyatā vāṅmūlā vāgviniḥsṛtāḥ |
N01.208c/ yo hy etāṁ stenayed vācaṁ sa sarvasteyakṛn naraḥ || 208 ||
N01.209a/ sākṣivipratipattau tu pramāṇaṁ bahavo yataḥ |
N01.209c/ tatsāmye śucayo grāhyās tatsāmye smṛtimattarāḥ || 209 ||
N01.210a/ smṛtimatsākṣisāmyaṁ tu vivāde yatra dṛśyate |
N01.210c/ sūkṣmatvāt sākṣidharmasya sākṣyaṁ vyāvartate punaḥ || 210 ||
N01.211a/ nirdiṣṭeṣv arthajāteṣu sākṣī cet sākṣyam āgataḥ |
N01.211c/ na brūyād akṣarasamaṁ na tan nigaditaṁ bhavet || 211 ||
N01.212a/ deśakālavayodravyapramāṇākṛtijātiṣu |
N01.212c/ yatra vipratipattiḥ syāt sākṣyaṁ tad asad ucyate || 212 ||
N01.213a/ ūnam abhyadhikaṁ cārthaṁ prabrūyur yatra sākṣiṇaḥ |
N01.213c/ tad apy anuktaṁ vijñeyam eṣa sākṣyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ || 213 ||
N01.214a/ pramādād dhanino yatra na syāl lekhyaṁ na sākṣiṇaḥ |
N01.214c/ arthaṁ cāpahnuyād vādī tatroktas trividho vidhiḥ || 214 ||
N01.215a/ codanā pratikālaṁ ca yuktileśas tathaiva ca |
N01.215c/ tṛtīyaḥ śapathaś coktas tair evaṁ sādhayet kramāt || 215 ||
N01.216a/ abhīkṣṇaṁ codyamāno yaḥ pratihanyān na tadvacaḥ |
N01.216c/ tricatuḥpañcakṛtvo vā parato 'rthaṁ tam āvahet || 216 ||
N01.217a/ codanāpratighāte tu yuktileśais tam anviyāt |
N01.217c/ deśakālārthasambandhaparimāṇakriyādibhiḥ || 217 ||
N01.218a/ yuktiṣv apy asamarthāsu śapathair enam ardayet |
N01.218c/ arthakālabalāpekṣam agnyambusukṛtādibhiḥ || 218 ||
N01.219a/ dīptāgnir yaṁ na dahati yam antardhārayanty āpaḥ |
N01.219c/ sa taraty abhiśāpaṁ taṁ kilbiṣī syād viparyaye || 219 ||
N01.220a/ strīṇāṁ śīlābhiyogeṣu steyasāhasayor api |
N01.220c/ eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭaḥ sarvārthāpahnaveṣu ca || 220 ||
N01.221a/ śapathā hy api devānām ṛṣīṇām api ca smṛtāḥ |
N01.221c/ vasiṣṭhaḥ śapathaṁ śepe yātudhāne tu śaṅkitaḥ || 221 ||
N01.222a/ saptarṣayas tathendrāya puṣkarārthe samāgatāḥ |
N01.222c/ śepuḥ śapatham avyagrāḥ parasparaviśuddhaye || 222 ||
N01.223a/ ayuktaṁ sāhasaṁ kṛtvā pratyāpattiṁ bhajeta yaḥ |
N01.223c/ brūyāt svayaṁ vā sadasi tasyārdhavinayaḥ smṛtaḥ || 223 ||
N01.224a/ gūhamānas tu daurātmyād yadi pāpaṁ sa jīyate |
N01.224c/ sabhyāś cātra na tuṣyanti tīvro daṇḍaś ca pātyate || 224 ||
N02.001a/ svadravyaṁ yatra viśrambhān nikṣipaty aviśaṅkitaḥ |
N02.001c/ nikṣepo nāma tat proktaṁ vyavahārapadaṁ budhaiḥ || 1 ||
N02.002a/ anyadravyavyavahitaṁ dravyam avyākṛtaṁ ca yat |
N02.002c/ nikṣipyate paragṛhe tad aupanidhikaṁ smṛtam || 2 ||
N02.003a/ sa punar dvividhaḥ proktaḥ sākṣimān itaras tathā |
N02.003c/ pratidānaṁ tathaivāsya pratyayaḥ syād viparyaye || 3 ||
N02.004a/ yācyamānas tu yo dātrā nikṣepaṁ na prayacchati |
N02.004c/ daṇḍyaḥ sa rājñā dāpyaś ca naṣṭe dāpyaś ca tatsamam || 4 ||
N02.005a/ yaś cārthaṁ sādhayet tena nikṣeptur ananujñayā |
N02.005c/ tatrāpi daṇḍyaḥ sa bhavet tac ca sodayam āvahet || 5 ||
N02.006a/ grahītuḥ saha yo 'rthena naṣṭo naṣṭaḥ sa dāyinaḥ |
N02.006c/ daivarājakṛte tadvan na cet taj jihmakāritam || 6 ||
N02.007a/ eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭo yācitānvāhitādiṣu |
N02.007c/ śilpiṣūpanidhau nyāse pratinyāse tathaiva ca || 7 ||
N02.008a/ pratigṛhṇāti pogaṇḍaṁ yaś ca sapradhanaṁ naraḥ |
N02.008c/ tasyāpy eṣa bhaved dharmaḥ ṣaḍ ete vidhayaḥ samāḥ || 8 ||

div2.head: Chapter 3 :: Sambhūyasamutthānam (Breach of Contract for Service)

lg.l: N03.001a/ vaṇikprabhṛtayo yatra karma sambhūya kurvate |
N03.001c/ tat sambhūyasamutthānaṁ vyavahārapadaṁ smṛtam || 1 ||
N03.002a/ phalahetor upāyena karma sambhūya kurvatām |
N03.002c/ ādhārabhūtaḥ prakṣepas tenottiṣṭheyur aṁśataḥ || 2 ||
N03.003a/ samo 'tirikto hīno vā yatrāṁśo yasya yādṛśaḥ |
N03.003c/ kṣayavyayau tathā vṛddhis tasya tatra tathāvidhāḥ || 3 ||
N03.004a/ bhāṇḍapiṇḍavyayoddhārabhārasārānvavekṣaṇam |
N03.004c/ kuryus te 'vyabhicāreṇa samaye sve vyavasthitāḥ || 4 ||
N03.005a/ pramādān nāśitaṁ dāpyaḥ pratiṣiddhakṛtaṁ ca yat |
N03.005c/ asandiṣṭaś ca yat kuryāt sarvaiḥ sambhūyakāribhiḥ || 5 ||
N03.006a/ daivataskararājotthe vyasane samupasthite |
N03.006c/ yas tat svaśaktyā saṁrakṣet tasyāṁśo daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ || 6 ||
N03.007a/ ekasya cet syād vyasanaṁ dāyādo 'sya tad āpnuyāt |
N03.007c/ anyo vāsati dāyāde śaktāś cet sarva eva vā || 7 ||
N03.008a/ ṛtvijāṁ vyasane 'py evam anyas tat karma nistaret |
N03.008c/ labheta dakṣiṇābhāgaṁ sa tasmāt samprakalpitam || 8 ||
N03.009a/ ṛtvig yājyam aduṣṭaṁ yas tyajed anapakāriṇam |
N03.009c/ aduṣṭaṁ va rtvijaṁ yājyo vineyau tāv ubhāv api || 9 ||
N03.010a/ ṛtvik tu trividho dṛṣṭaḥ pūrvajuṣṭaḥ svayaṅkṛtaḥ |
N03.010c/ yadṛcchayā ca yaḥ kuryād ārtvijyaṁ prītipūrvakam || 10 ||
N03.011a/ kramāgateṣv eṣa dharmo vṛteṣv ṛtvikṣu ca svayam |
N03.011c/ yādṛcchike tu saṁyājye tattyāge nāsti kilbiṣam || 11 ||
N03.012a/ śulkasthānaṁ vaṇik prāptaḥ śulkaṁ dadyād yathopagam |
N03.012c/ na tad vyatihared rājñāṁ balir eṣa prakalpitaḥ || 12 ||
N03.013a/ śulkasthānaṁ pariharan na kāle krayavikrayī |
N03.013c/ mithyoktvā ca parīmāṇaṁ dāpyo 'ṣṭaguṇam atyayam || 13 ||
N03.014a/ kaścic cet sañcaran deśāt preyād abhyāgato vaṇik |
N03.014c/ rājāsya bhāṇḍaṁ tad rakṣet yāvad dāyādadarśanam || 14 ||
N03.015a/ dāyāde 'sati bandhubhyo jñātibhyo vā tad arpayet |
N03.015c/ tadabhāve suguptaṁ tad dhārayed daśatīḥ samāḥ || 15 ||
N03.016a/ asvāmikam adāyādaṁ daśavarṣasthitaṁ tataḥ |
N03.016c/ rājā tad ātmasāt kuryād evaṁ dharmo na hīyate || 16 ||
N04.001a/ dattvā dravyam asamyag yaḥ punar ādātum icchati |
N04.001c/ dattāpradānikaṁ nāma tad vivādapadaṁ smṛtam || 1 ||
N04.002a/ adeyam atha deyaṁ ca dattaṁ cādattam eva ca |
N04.002c/ vyavahāreṣu vijñeyo dānamārgaś caturvidhaḥ || 2 ||
N04.003a/ tatra hyaṣṭāv adeyāni deyam ekavidhaṁ smṛtam |
N04.003c/ dattaṁ saptavidhaṁ vidyād adattaṁ ṣoḍaśātmakam || 3 ||
N04.004a/ anvāhitaṁ yācitakam ādhiḥ sādhāraṇaṁ ca yat |
N04.004c/ nikṣepaḥ putradāraṁ ca sarvasvaṁ cānvaye sati || 4 ||
N04.005a/ āpatsv api hi kaṣṭāsu vartamānena dehinā |
N04.005c/ adeyāny āhur ācāryā yac cānyasmai pratiśrutam || 5 ||
N04.006a/ kuṭumbabharaṇād dravyaṁ yatkiñcid atiricyate |
N04.006c/ tad deyam upahṛtyānyad dadad doṣam avāpnuyāt || 6 ||
N04.007a/ paṇyamūlyaṁ bhṛtis tuṣṭyā snehāt pratyupakārataḥ |
N04.007c/ strīśulkānugrahārthaṁ ca dattaṁ dānavido viduḥ || 7 ||
N04.008a/ adattaṁ tu bhayakrodhaśokavegarujānvitaiḥ |
N04.008c/ tathotkocaparīhāsavyatyāsacchalayogataḥ || 8 ||
N04.009a/ bālamūḍhāsvatantrārtamattonmattāpavarjitam |
N04.009c/ kartā mamāyaṁ karmeti pratilābhecchayā ca yat || 9 ||
N04.010a/ apātre pātram ity ukte kārye cādharmasaṁhite |
N04.010c/ yad dattaṁ syād avijñānād adattaṁ tad api smṛtam || 10 ||
N04.011a/ gṛhṇāty adattaṁ yo lobhād yaś cādeyaṁ prayacchati |
N04.011c/ adattādāyako daṇḍyas tathādeyasya dāyakaḥ || 11 ||

div2.head: Chapter 5 :: Abhyupetyāśuśrūṣā (Breach of Contract for Service)

lg.l: N05.001a/ abhyupetya tu śuśrūṣāṁ yas tāṁ na pratipadyate |
N05.001c/ aśuśrūṣābhyupetyaitad vivādapadam ucyate || 1 ||
N05.002a/ śuśrūṣakaḥ pañcavidhaḥ śāstre dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ |
N05.002c/ caturvidhaḥ karmakaras teṣāṁ dāsās tripañcakāḥ || 2 ||
N05.003a/ śiṣyāntevāsibhṛtakāś caturthas tv adhikarmakṛt |
N05.003c/ ete karmakarāḥ proktā dāsās tu gṛhajādayaḥ || 3 ||
N05.004a/ sāmānyam asvatantratvam eṣām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ |
N05.004c/ jātikarmakṛtas tūkto viśeṣo vṛttir eva ca || 4 ||
N05.005a/ karmāpi dvividhaṁ jñeyam aśubhaṁ śubham eva ca |
N05.005c/ aśubhaṁ dāsakarmoktaṁ śubhaṁ karmakṛtāṁ smṛtam || 5 ||
N05.006a/ gṛhadvārāśucisthānarathyāvaskaraśodhanam |
N05.006c/ guhyāṅgasparśanocchiṣṭaviṇmūtragrahaṇojjhanam || 6 ||
N05.007a/ iṣṭataḥ svāminaś cāṅgair upasthānam athāntataḥ |
N05.007c/ aśubhaṁ karma vijñeyaṁ śubham anyad ataḥ param || 7 ||
N05.008a/ ā vidyāgrahaṇāc chiṣyaḥ śuśrūṣet prayato gurum |
N05.008c/ tadvṛttir gurudāreṣu guruputre tathaiva ca || 8 ||
N05.009a/ brahmacārī cared bhaikṣam adhaḥśāyy analaṅkṛtaḥ |
N05.009c/ jaghanyaśāyī sarveṣāṁ pūrvotthāyī guror gṛhe || 9 ||
N05.010a/ nāsandiṣṭaḥ pratiṣṭheta tiṣṭhed vāpi guruṁ kvacit |
N05.010c/ sandiṣṭaḥ karma kurvīta śaktaś ced avicārayan || 10 ||
N05.011a/ yathākālam adhīyīta yāvan na vimanā guruḥ |
N05.011c/ āsīno 'dho guroḥ kūrce phalake vā samāhitaḥ || 11 ||
N05.012a/ anuśāsyaś ca guruṇā na ced anuvidhīyate |
N05.012c/ avadhenāthavā hanyāt rajjvā veṇudalena vā || 12 ||
N05.013a/ bhṛśaṁ na tāḍayed enaṁ nottamāṅge na vakṣasi |
N05.013c/ anuśāsyātha viśvāsyaḥ śāsyo rājñānyathā guruḥ || 13 ||
N05.014a/ samāvṛttaś ca gurave pradāya gurudakṣiṇām |
N05.014c/ pratīyāt svagṛhān eṣā śiṣyavṛttir udāhṛtā || 14 ||
N05.015a/ svaśilpam icchann āhartuṁ bāndhavānām anujñayā |
N05.015c/ ācāryasya vased ante kālaṁ kṛtvā suniścitam || 15 ||
N05.016a/ ācāryaḥ śikṣayed enaṁ svagṛhād dattabhojanam |
N05.016c/ na cānyat kārayet karma putravac cainam ācaret || 16 ||
N05.017a/ śikṣayantam aduṣṭaṁ ca yas tv ācāryaṁ parityajet |
N05.017c/ balād vāsayitavyaḥ syād vadhabandhau ca so 'rhati || 17 ||
N05.018a/ śikṣito 'pi kṛtaṁ kālam antevāsī samāpnuyāt |
N05.018c/ tatra karma ca yat kuryād ācāryasyaiva tatphalam || 18 ||
N05.019a/ gṛhītaśilpaḥ samaye kṛtvācāryaṁ pradakṣiṇam |
N05.019c/ śaktitaś cānumānyainam antevāsī nivartayet || 19 ||
N05.020a/ bhṛtakas trividho jñeya uttamo madhyamo 'dhamaḥ |
N05.020c/ śaktibhaktyanurūpā syād eṣāṁ karmāśrayā bhṛtiḥ || 20 ||
N05.021a/ uttamas tv āyudhīyo 'tra madhyamas tu kṛṣīvalaḥ |
N05.021c/ adhamo bhāravāhaḥ syād ity evaṁ trividho bhṛtaḥ || 21 ||
N05.022a/ artheṣv adhikṛto yaḥ syāt kuṭumbasya tathopari |
N05.022c/ so 'dhikarmakaro jñeyaḥ sa ca kauṭumbikaḥ smṛtaḥ || 22 ||
N05.023a/ śubhakarmakarās tv ete catvāraḥ samudāhṛtāḥ |
N05.023c/ jaghanyakarmabhājas tu śeṣā dāsās tripañcakāḥ || 23 ||
N05.024a/ gṛhajātas tathā krīto labdho dāyād upāgataḥ |
N05.024c/ anākālabhṛtas tadvad ādhattaḥ svāminā ca yaḥ || 24 ||
N05.025a/ mokṣito mahataś carṇāt prāpto yuddhāt paṇe jitaḥ |
N05.025c/ tavāham ity upagataḥ pravrajyāvasitaḥ kṛtaḥ || 25 ||
N05.026a/ bhaktadāsaś ca vijñeyas tathaiva vaḍavābhṛtaḥ |
N05.026c/ vikretā cātmanaḥ śāstre dāsāḥ pañcadaśā smṛtāḥ || 26 ||
N05.027a/ tatra pūrvaś caturvargo dāsatvān na vimucyate |
N05.027c/ prasādād svāmino 'nyatra dāsyam eṣāṁ kramāgatam || 27 ||
N05.028a/ yaś caiṣāṁ svāminaṁ kaścin mokṣayet prāṇasaṁśayāt |
N05.028c/ dāsatvāt sa vimucyeta putrabhāgaṁ labheta ca || 28 ||
N05.029a/ anākālabhṛto dāsyān mucyate goyugaṁ dadat |
N05.029c/ sambhakṣitaṁ yad durbhikṣe na tac chudhyeta karmaṇā || 29 ||
N05.030a/ ādhatto 'pi dhanaṁ dattvā svāmī yady enam uddharet |
N05.030c/ athopagamayed enaṁ sa vikrītād anantaraḥ || 30 ||
N05.031a/ dattvā tu sodayam ṛṇaṁ ṛṇī dāsyāt pramucyate |
N05.031c/ kṛtakālābhyupagamāt kṛtako 'pi vimucyate || 31 ||
N05.032a/ tavāham ity upagato yuddhaprāptaḥ paṇe jitaḥ |
N05.032c/ pratiśīrṣapradānena mucyate tulyakarmaṇā || 32 ||
N05.033a/ rājña eva tu dāsaḥ syāt pravrajyāvasito naraḥ |
N05.033c/ na tasya pratimokṣo 'sti na viśuddhiḥ kathañcana || 33 ||
N05.034a/ bhaktasyopekṣaṇāt sadyo bhaktadāsaḥ pramucyate |
N05.034c/ nigrahād vaḍavāyāś ca mucyate vaḍavābhṛtaḥ || 34 ||
N05.035a/ vikrīṇīte ya ātmānaṁ svatantraḥ san narādhamaḥ |
N05.035c/ sa jaghanyataras teṣāṁ naiva dāsyāt pramucyate || 35 ||
N05.036a/ caurāpahṛtavikrītā ye ca dāsīkṛtā balāt |
N05.036c/ rājñā mokṣayitavyās te dāsatvaṁ teṣu neṣyate || 36 ||
N05.037a/ varṇānāṁ prātilomyena dāsatvaṁ na vidhīyate |
N05.037c/ svadharmatyāgino 'nyatra dāravad dāsatā matā || 37 ||
N05.038a/ tavāham iti cātmānaṁ yo 'svatantraḥ prayacchati |
N05.038c/ na sa taṁ prāpnuyāt kāmaṁ pūrvasvāmī labheta tam || 38 ||
N05.039a/ adhanās traya evoktā bhāryā dāsas tathā sutaḥ |
N05.039c/ yat te samadhigacchanti yasya te tasya tad dhanam || 39 ||
N05.040a/ svadāsam icched yaḥ kartum adāsaṁ prītamānasaḥ |
N05.040c/ skandhād ādāya tasyāpi bhindyāt kumbhaṁ sahāmbhasā || 40 ||
N05.041a/ akṣatābhiḥ sapuṣpābhir mūrdhany enam avākiret |
N05.041c/ adāsa iti coktvā triḥ prāṅmukhaṁ tam athotsṛjet || 41 ||
N05.042a/ tataḥprabhṛti vaktavyaḥ svāmyanugrahapālitaḥ |
N05.042c/ bhojyānnaḥ pratigṛhyaś ca bhavaty abhimataś ca saḥ || 42 ||
N06.001a/ bhṛtānāṁ vetanasyokto dānādānavidhikramaḥ |
N06.001c/ vetanasyānapākarma tad vivādapadaṁ smṛtam || 1 ||
N06.002a/ bhṛtāya vetanaṁ dadyāt karmasvāmī yathākramam |
N06.002c/ ādau madhye 'vasāne vā karmaṇo yad viniścitam || 2 ||
N06.003a/ bhṛtāvaniścitāyāṁ tu daśabhāgaṁ samāpnuyuḥ |
N06.003c/ lābhagobījasasyānāṁ vaṇiggopakṛṣībalāḥ || 3 ||
N06.004a/ karmopakaraṇaṁ caiṣāṁ kriyāṁ prati yad āhṛtam |
N06.004c/ āptabhāvena kurvīta na jihmena samācaret || 4 ||
N06.005a/ karmākurvan pratiśrutya kāryo dattvā bhṛtiṁ balāt |
N06.005c/ bhṛtiṁ gṛhītvākurvāṇo dviguṇāṁ bhṛtim āvahet || 5 ||
N06.006a/ kāle 'pūrṇe tyajet karma bhṛtināśo 'sya cārhati |
N06.006c/ svāmidoṣād apākrāman yāvat kṛtam avāpnuyāt || 6 ||
N06.007a/ bhṛtiṣaḍbhāgam ābhāṣya pathi yugyakṛtaṁ tyajan |
N06.007c/ adadat kārayitvā tu karmaivaṁ sodayāṁ bhṛtim || 7 ||
N06.008a/ anayan bhāṭayitvā tu bhāṇḍavān yānavāhane |
N06.008c/ dāpyo bhṛticaturbhāgaṁ samam ardhapathe tyajan || 8 ||
N06.009a/ anayan vāhako 'py evaṁ bhṛtihānim avāpnuyāt |
N06.009c/ dviguṇāṁ tu bhṛtiṁ dāpyaḥ prasthāne vighnam ācaran || 9 ||
N06.010a/ bhāṇḍaṁ vyasanam āgacched yadi vāhakadoṣataḥ |
N06.010c/ dāpyo yat tatra naṣṭaṁ syād daivarājakṛtād ṛte || 10 ||
N06.011a/ gavāṁ śatād vatsatarī dhenuḥ syād dviśatād bhṛtiḥ |
N06.011c/ prati samvatsaraṁ gope sadohaś cāṣṭame 'hani || 11 ||
N06.012a/ upānayet gā gopāya pratyahaṁ rajanīkṣaye |
N06.012c/ cīṛṇāḥ pītāś ca tā gopaḥ sāyāhne pratyupānayet || 12 ||
N06.013a/ syāc ced govyasanaṁ gopo vyāyacchet tatra śaktitaḥ |
N06.013c/ aśaktas tūrṇam āgamya svāmine tan nivedayet || 13 ||
N06.014a/ avyāyac channavikrośan svāmine cānivedayan |
N06.014c/ voḍhum arhati gopas tāṁ vinayaṁ cāpi rājani || 14 ||
N06.015a/ naṣṭavinaṣṭaṁ kṛmibhiḥ śvahataṁ viṣame mṛtam |
N06.015c/ hīnaṁ puruṣakāreṇa gopāyaiva nipātayet || 15 ||
N06.016a/ ajāvike tathāruddhe vṛkaiḥ pāle tv anāyati |
N06.016c/ yat prasahya vṛko hanyāt pāle tatkilbiṣam bhavet || 16 ||
N06.017a/ tāsāṁ caivāniruddhānāṁ carantīnāṁ mitho vane |
N06.017c/ yām utpatya vṛko hanyān na pālas tatra kilbiṣī || 17 ||
N06.018a/ vighuṣya tu hṛtaṁ caurair na pālo dātum arhati |
N06.018c/ yadi deśe ca kāle ca svāminaḥ svasya śaṁsati || 18 ||
N06.019a/ etena sarvapālānāṁ vivādaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ |
N06.019c/ mṛteṣu ca viśuddhiḥ syāt pālasyāṅkādidarśanāt || 19 ||
N06.020a/ śulkaṁ gṛhītvā paṇyastrī necchantī dvis tad āvahet |
N06.020c/ aprayacchaṁs tadā śulkam anubhūya pumān striyam || 20 ||
N06.021a/ ayonau kramate yas tu bahubhir vāpi vāsayet |
N06.021c/ śulkam aṣṭaguṇaṁ dāpyo vinayas tāvad eva ca || 21 ||
N06.022a/ parājire gṛhaṁ kṛtvā stomaṁ dattvā vaset tu yaḥ |
N06.022c/ sa tad gṛhītvā nirgacchet tṛṇakāṣṭheṣṭakādikam || 22 ||
N06.023a/ stomavāhīni bhāṇḍāni pūrṇakālāny upānayet |
N06.023c/ grahītur ābhaved bhagnaṁ naṣṭaṁ cānyatra samplavāt || 23 ||
N07.001a/ nikṣiptaṁ vā paradravyaṁ naṣṭaṁ labdhvāpahṛtya vā |
N07.001c/ vikrīyate 'samakṣaṁ yad vijñeyo 'svāmivikrayaḥ || 1 ||
N07.002a/ dravyam asvāmivikrītaṁ prāpya svāmī samāpnuyāt |
N07.002c/ prakāśaṁ krayataḥ śuddhiḥ kretuḥ steyaṁ rahaḥ krayāt || 2 ||
N07.003a/ asvāmyanumatād dāsād asataś ca janād rahaḥ |
N07.003c/ hīnamūlyam avelāyāṁ krīṇaṁs taddoṣabhāg bhavet || 3 ||
N07.004a/ na gūhetāgamaṁ kretā śuddhis tasya tadāgamāt |
N07.004c/ viparyaye tulyadoṣaḥ steyadaṇḍaṁ ca so 'rhati || 4 ||
N07.005a/ vikretā svāmine 'rthaṁ ca kretur mūlyaṁ ca tatkṛtam |
N07.005c/ dadyād daṇḍaṁ tathā rājñe vidhir asvāmivikraye || 5 ||
N07.006a/ pareṇa nihitaṁ labdhvā rājany upaharen nidhim |
N07.006c/ rājagāmī nidhiḥ sarvaḥ sarveṣāṁ brāhmaṇād ṛte || 6 ||
N07.007a/ brāhmaṇo 'pi nidhiṁ labdhvā kṣipraṁ rājñe nivedayet |
N07.007c/ tena dattaṁ ca bhūñjīta stenaḥ syād anivedayan || 7 ||
N07.008a/ svam apy arthaṁ tathā naṣṭaṁ labdhvā rājñe nivedayet |
N07.008c/ gṛhṇīyāt tatra taṁ śuddham aśuddhaṁ syāt tato 'nyathā || 8 ||

div2.head: Chapter 8 :: Krītānuśayaḥ (Nondelivery of What Has Been Sold)

lg.l: N08.001a/ vikrīya paṇyaṁ mūlyena kretur yan na pradīyate |
N08.001c/ vikrīyāsampradānaṁ tad vivādapadam ucyate || 1 ||
N08.002a/ loke 'smin dvividhaṁ dravyaṁ jaṅgamaṁ sthāvaraṁ tathā |
N08.002c/ krayavikrayadharmeṣu sarvaṁ tat paṇyam ucyate || 2 ||
N08.003a/ ṣaḍvidhas tasya tu budhair dānādānavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
N08.003c/ gaṇimaṁ tulimaṁ meyaṁ kriyayā rūpataḥ śriyā || 3 ||
N08.004a/ vikrīya paṇyaṁ mūlyena kretur yo na prayacchati |
N08.004c/ sthāvarasya kṣayaṁ dāpyo jaṅgamasya kriyāphalam || 4 ||
N08.005a/ arghaś ced apahīyeta sodayaṁ paṇyam āvahet |
N08.005c/ sthāyinām eṣa niyamo diglābho digvicāriṇām || 5 ||
N08.006a/ upahanyeta vā paṇyaṁ dahyetāpahriyeta vā |
N08.006c/ vikretur eva so 'nartho vikrīyāsamprayacchataḥ || 6 ||
N08.007a/ nirdoṣaṁ darśayitvā tu sadoṣaṁ yaḥ prayacchati |
N08.007c/ mūlyaṁ taddviguṇaṁ dāpyo vinayaṁ tāvad eva ca || 7 ||
N08.008a/ tathānyahaste vikrīya yo 'nyasmai samprayacchati |
N08.008c/ so 'pi taddviguṇaṁ dāpyo vineyas tāvad eva ca || 8 ||
N08.009a/ dīyamānaṁ na gṛhṇāti krītaṁ paṇyaṁ ca yaḥ krayī |
N08.009c/ vikrīṇānas tad anyatra vikretā nāparādhnuyāt || 9 ||
N08.010a/ dattamūlyasya paṇyasya vidhir eṣa prakīrtitaḥ |
N08.010c/ adatte 'nyatra samayān na vikretur atikramaḥ || 10 ||
N08.011a/ lābhārthe vaṇijāṁ sarvapaṇyeṣu krayavikrayaḥ |
N08.011c/ sa ca lābho 'rgham āsādya mahān bhavati vā na vā || 11 ||
N08.012a/ tasmād deśe ca kāle ca vaṇig arghaṁ parākramet |
N08.012c/ na jihmena pravarteta śreyān evaṁ vaṇikpathaḥ || 12 ||
N09.001a/ krītvā mūlyena yaḥ paṇyaṁ kretā na bahu manyate |
N09.001c/ krītvānuśaya ity etad vivādapadam ucyate || 1 ||
N09.002a/ krītvā mūlyena yat paṇyaṁ duṣkrītaṁ manyate krayī |
N09.002c/ vikretuḥ pratideyaṁ tat tasminn evāhny avikṣatam || 2 ||
N09.003a/ dvitīye 'hni dadat kretā mūlyāt triṁśāṁśam āvahet |
N09.003c/ dviguṇaṁ tat tṛtīye 'hni parataḥ kretur eva tat || 3 ||
N09.004a/ kretā paṇyaṁ parīkṣeta prāk svayaṁ guṇadoṣataḥ |
N09.004c/ parīkṣyābhimataṁ krītaṁ vikretur na bhavet punaḥ || 4 ||
N09.005a/ tryahād dohyaṁ parīkṣeta pañcāhād vāhyam eva tu |
N09.005c/ muktāvajrapravālānāṁ saptāhaṁ syāt parīkṣaṇam || 5 ||
N09.006a/ dvipadām ardhamāsaṁ syāt puṁsāṁ taddviguṇaṁ striyāḥ |
N09.006c/ daśāhaṁ sarvabījānām ekāhaṁ lohavāsasām || 6 ||
N09.007a/ paribhuktaṁ ca yad vāsaḥ kliṣṭarūpaṁ malīmasam |
N09.007c/ sadoṣam api vikrītaṁ vikretur na bhavet punaḥ || 7 ||
N09.008a/ mūlyāṣṭabhāgo hīyeta sakṛd dhautasya vāsasaḥ |
N09.008c/ dviḥ pādas tris tribhāgas tu catuḥkṛtvo 'rdham eva ca || 8 ||
N09.009a/ ardhakṣayāt tu parataḥ pādāṁśāpacayaḥ kramāt |
N09.009c/ yāvat kṣīṇadaśaṁ jīrṇaṁ jīrṇasyāniyamaḥ kṣaye || 9 ||
N09.010a/ lohānām api sarveṣāṁ hetur agnikriyāvidhau |
N09.010c/ kṣayaḥ saṁskriyamāṇānāṁ teṣāṁ dṛṣṭo 'gnisaṅgamāt || 10 ||
N09.011a/ suvarṇasya kṣayo nāsti rajate dvipalaṁ śatam |
N09.011c/ śatam aṣṭapalaṁ jñeyaṁ kṣayas syāt trapusīsayoḥ || 11 ||
N09.012a/ tāmre pañcapalaṁ vidyād vikārā ye ca tanmayāḥ |
N09.012c/ taddhātūnām anekatvād ayaso 'niyamaḥ kṣaye || 12 ||
N09.013a/ tāntavasya ca saṁskāre kṣayavṛddhī udāhṛte |
N09.013c/ sūtrakārpāsikorṇānāṁ vṛddhir daśapalaṁ śatam || 13 ||
N09.014a/ sthūlasūtravatāṁ teṣāṁ madhyānāṁ pañcakaṁ śatam |
N09.014c/ tripalaṁ tu susūkṣmāṇām antaḥkṣaya udāhṛtaḥ || 14 ||
N09.015a/ triṁśāṁśo romaviddhasya kṣayaḥ karmakṛtasya tu |
N09.015c/ kauṣeyavalkalānāṁ tu naiva vṛddhir na ca kṣayaḥ || 15 ||
N09.016a/ krītvā nānuśayaṁ kuryād vaṇik paṇyavicakṣaṇaḥ |
N09.016c/ vṛddhikṣayau tu jānīyāt paṇyānām āgamaṁ tathā || 16 ||
N10.001a/ pāṣaṇḍanaigamādīnāṁ sthitiḥ samaya ucyate |
N10.001c/ samayasyānapākarma tad vivādapadaṁ smṛtam || 1 ||
N10.002a/ pāṣaṇḍanaigamaśreṇīpūgavrātagaṇādiṣu |
N10.002c/ saṁrakṣet samayaṁ rājā durge janapade tathā || 2 ||
N10.003a/ yo dharmaḥ karma yac caiṣām upasthānavidhiś ca yaḥ |
N10.003c/ yac caiṣāṁ vṛttyupādānam anumanyeta tat tathā || 3 ||
N10.004a/ pratikūlaṁ ca yad rājñaḥ prakṛtyavamataṁ ca yat |
N10.004c/ bādhakaṁ ca yad arthānāṁ tat tebhyo vinivartayet || 4 ||
N10.005a/ mithaḥ saṅghātakaraṇam ahitaṁ śastradhāraṇam |
N10.005c/ parasparopaghātaṁ ca teṣāṁ rājā na marṣayet || 5 ||
N10.006a/ pṛthag gaṇāṁś ca ye bhindyus te vineyā viśeṣataḥ |
N10.006c/ āvaheyur bhayaṁ ghoraṁ vyādhivat te hy upekṣitāḥ || 6 ||
N10.007a/ doṣavat karaṇaṁ yat syād anāmnāyaprakalpitam |
N10.007c/ pravṛttam api tad rājā śreyaskāmo nivartayet || 7 ||
N11.001a/ setukedāramaryādāvikṛṣṭākṛṣṭaniścayāḥ |
N11.001c/ kṣetrādhikārā yatra syur vivādaḥ kṣetrajas tu saḥ || 1 ||
N11.002a/ kṣetrasīmāvirodheṣu sāmantebhyo viniścayaḥ |
N11.002c/ nagaragrāmagaṇino ye ca vṛddhatamā narāḥ || 2 ||
N11.003a/ grāmasīmāsu ca bahir ye syus tatkṛṣijīvinaḥ |
N11.003c/ gopaśākunikavyādhā ye cānye vanagocarāḥ || 3 ||
N11.004a/ samunnayeyus te sīmāṁ lakṣaṇair upalakṣitām |
N11.004c/ tuṣāṅgārakapālaiś ca kumbhair āyatanair drumaiḥ || 4 ||
N11.005a/ abhijñātaiś ca valmīkasthalanimnonnatādibhiḥ |
N11.005c/ kedārārāmamārgaiś ca purāṇaiḥ setubhis tathā || 5 ||
N11.006a/ nimnagāpahṛtotsṛṣṭanaṣṭacihnāsu bhūmiṣu |
N11.006c/ tatpradeśānumānāc ca pramāṇair bhogadarśanaiḥ || 6 ||
N11.007a/ atha ced anṛtaṁ brūyuḥ sāmantās tadviniścaye |
N11.007c/ sarve pṛthak pṛthag daṇḍyā rājñā madhyamasāhasam || 7 ||
N11.008a/ gaṇavṛddhādayas tv anye daṇḍaṁ dāpyāḥ pṛthak pṛthak |
N11.008c/ vineyāḥ prathamena syuḥ sāhasenānṛte sthitāḥ || 8 ||
N11.009a/ naikaḥ samunnayet sīmāṁ naraḥ pratyayavān api |
N11.009c/ gurutvād asya dharmasya kriyaiṣā bahuṣu sthitā || 9 ||
N11.010a/ ekaś ced unnayet sīmāṁ sopavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ |
N11.010c/ raktamālyāmbaradharaḥ kṣitim āropya mūrdhani || 10 ||
N11.011a/ yadā ca na syur jñātāraḥ sīmāyā na ca lakṣaṇam |
N11.011c/ tadā rājā dvayoḥ sīmām uddhared iṣṭataḥ svayam || 11 ||
N11.012a/ etenaiva gṛhodyānanipānāyatanādiṣu |
N11.012c/ vivādavidhir ākhyātas tathā grāmāntareṣu ca || 12 ||
N11.013a/ avaskarasthalaśvabhrabhramasyandanikādibhiḥ |
N11.013c/ catuṣpathasurasthānarathyāmārgān na rodhayet || 13 ||
N11.014a/ parakṣetrasya madhye tu setur na pratiṣidhyate |
N11.014c/ mahāguṇo 'lpabādhaś ca vṛddhir iṣṭā kṣaye sati || 14 ||
N11.015a/ setus tu dvididho jñeyaḥ kheyo bandhyas tathaiva ca |
N11.015c/ toyapravartanān kheyo bandhyaḥ syāt tannivartanāt || 15 ||
N11.016a/ nāntareṇodakaṁ sasyaṁ naśyed abhyudakena tu |
N11.016c/ ya evānudake doṣaḥ sa evābhyudake smṛtaḥ || 16 ||
N11.017a/ pūrvapravṛttam utsannam apṛṣṭvā svāminaṁ tu yaḥ |
N11.017c/ setuṁ pravartayet kaścin na sa tatphalabhāg bhavet || 17 ||
N11.018a/ mṛte tu svāmini punas tadvaṁśye vāpi mānave |
N11.018c/ rājānam āmantrya tataḥ prakuryāt setukarma tat || 18 ||
N11.019a/ ato 'nyathā kleśabhāk syān mṛgavyādhānudarśanāt |
N11.019c/ iṣavas tasya naśyanti yo viddham anuvidhyati || 19 ||
N11.020a/ aśaktapretanaṣṭeṣu kṣetrikeṣv anivāritaḥ |
N11.020c/ kṣetraṁ ced vikṛṣet kaścid aśnuvīta sa tatphalam || 20 ||
N11.021a/ vikṛṣyamāṇe kṣetre cet kṣetrikaḥ punar āvrajet |
N11.021c/ khilopacāraṁ tat sarvaṁ dattvā svakṣetram āpnuyāt || 21 ||
N11.022a/ tadaṣṭabhāgāpacayād yāvat sapta gatāḥ samāḥ |
N11.022c/ samprāpte tv aṣṭame varṣe bhuktaṁ kṣetraṁ labheta saḥ || 22 ||
N11.023a/ saṁvatsareṇārdhakhilaṁ khilaṁ tad vatsarais tribhiḥ |
N11.023c/ pañcavarṣāvasannaṁ tu syāt kṣetram aṭavīsamam || 23 ||
N11.024a/ kṣetraṁ tripuruṣaṁ yat syād gṛhaṁ vā syāt kramāgatam |
N11.024c/ rājaprasādād anyatra na tadbhogaḥ paraṁ nayet || 24 ||
N11.025a/ utkramya tu vṛtiṁ yatra sasyaghāto gavādibhiḥ |
N11.025c/ pālaḥ śāsyo bhavet tatra na cec chaktyā nivārayet || 25 ||
N11.026a/ samūlasasyanāśe tu tatsvāmī samam āpnuyāt |
N11.026c/ vadhena pālo mucyeta daṇḍaṁ svāmini pātayet || 26 ||
N11.027a/ gauḥ prasūtā daśāhāt ca mahokṣājāvikuñjarāḥ |
N11.027c/ nivāryās tu prayatnena teṣāṁ svāmī na daṇḍabhāk || 27 ||
N11.028a/ māṣaṁ gāṁ dāpayed daṇḍaṁ dvau māṣau mahiṣīṁ tathā |
N11.028c/ ajāvike savatse tu daṇḍaḥ syād ardhamāṣakaḥ || 28 ||
N11.029a/ adaṇḍyā hastino 'śvāś ca prajāpālā hi te smṛtāḥ |
N11.029c/ adaṇḍyā garbhiṇī gauś ca sūtikā cābhisāriṇī || 29 ||
N11.030a/ proktas tu dvir niṣaṇṇānāṁ vasantyāṁ tu caturguṇam |
N11.030c/ pratyakṣacārakāṇāṁ tu cauradaṇḍaḥ smṛṭas tathā || 30 ||
N11.031a/ yā naṣṭāḥ pāladoṣeṇa gāvaḥ kṣetraṁ samāśritāḥ |
N11.031c/ na tatra gomino daṇḍaḥ pālas taṁ daṇḍam arhati || 31 ||
N11.032a/ rājagrāhagṛhīto vā vajrāśanihato 'pi vā |
N11.032c/ atha sarpeṇa daṣṭo vā giry agrāt patito 'pi vā || 32 ||
N11.033a/ siṁhavyāghrahato vāpi vyādhibhiḥ caiva pātitaḥ |
N11.033c/ na tatra doṣaḥ pālasya na ca doṣo 'sti gominām || 33 ||
N11.034a/ gobhis tu bhakṣitaṁ dhānyaṁ yo naraḥ pratimārgati |
N11.034c/ sāmantasya śado deyo dhānyaṁ yat tatra vāpitam |
N11.034e/ gavatraṁ gomine deyaṁ dhānyaṁ tatkarṣikasya tu || 34 ||
N11.035a/ grāmopānte ca yat kṣetraṁ vivītānte mahāpathe |
N11.035c/ anāvṛte cet tannāśe na pālasya vyatikramaḥ || 35 ||
N11.036a/ pathi kṣetre vṛtiḥ kāryā yām uṣṭro nāvalokayet |
N11.036c/ na laṅghayet paśur nāśvo na bhidyād yāṁ ca sūkaraḥ || 36 ||
N11.037a/ gṛhaṁ kṣetraṁ ca vijñeyaṁ vāsahetuḥ kuṭumbinām |
N11.037c/ tasmāt tan nākṣiped rājā tad dhi mūlaṁ kuṭumbinām || 37 ||
N11.038a/ vṛddhe janapade rājño dharmaḥ kośaś ca vardhate |
N11.038c/ hīyate hīyamāne ca vṛddhihetum ataḥ śrayet || 38 ||

div2.head: Chapter 12 :: Strīpuṁsayogaḥ (Relations between Men and Women)

lg.l: N12.001a/ vivāhādividhiḥ strīṇāṁ yatra puṁsāṁ ca kīrtyate |
N12.001c/ strīpuṁsayoganāmaitad vivādapadam ucyate || 1 ||
N12.002a/ strīpuṁsayos tu sambandhād varaṇaṁ prāg vidhīyate |
N12.002c/ varaṇād grahaṇaṁ pāṇeḥ saṁskāro 'tha dvilakṣaṇaḥ || 2 ||
N12.003a/ tayor aniyataṁ proktaṁ varaṇaṁ doṣadarśanāt |
N12.003c/ pāṇigrahaṇamantrābhyāṁ niyataṁ dāralakṣaṇam || 3 ||
N12.004a/ brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṁ śūdrāṇāṁ ca parigrahe |
N12.004c/ svajātyā śreyasī bhāryā svajātyaś ca patiḥ striyāḥ || 4 ||
N12.005a/ brāhmaṇasyānulomyena striyo 'nyās tisra eva tu |
N12.005c/ śūdrāyāḥ prātilomyena tathānye patayas trayaḥ || 5 ||
N12.006a/ dve bhārye kṣatriyasyānye vaiśyasyaikā prakīrtitā |
N12.006c/ vaiśyāyā dvau patī jñeyāv eko 'nyaḥ kṣatriyāpatiḥ || 6 ||
N12.007a/ ā saptamāt pañcamād vā bandhubhyaḥ pitṛmātṛtāḥ |
N12.007c/ avivāhyāḥ sagotrāḥ syuḥ samānapravarās tathā || 7 ||
N12.008a/ parīkṣyaḥ puruṣaḥ puṁstve nijair evāṅgalakṣaṇaiḥ |
N12.008c/ pumāṁś ced avikalpena sa kanyāṁ labdhum arhati || 8 ||
N12.009a/ subaddhajatrujānvasthiḥ subaddhāṁsaśirodharaḥ |
N12.009c/ sthūlaghāṭas tanūrutvag avilagnagatisvaraḥ || 9 ||
N12.010a/ viṭ cāsya plavate nāpsu hlādi mūtraṁ ca phenilam |
N12.010c/ pumān syāṁl lakṣaṇair etair viparītais tu paṇḍakaḥ || 10 ||
N12.011a/ caturdaśavidhaḥ śāstre sa tu dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ |
N12.011c/ cikitsyaś cācikitsyaś ca teṣām ukto vidhiḥ kramāt || 11 ||
N12.012a/ nisargapaṇḍo vadhriś ca pakṣapaṇḍas tathaiva ca |
N12.012c/ abhiśāpād guro rogād devakrodhāt tathaiva ca || 12 ||
N12.013a/ īrṣyāpaṇḍaś ca sevyaś ca vātaretā mukhebhagaḥ |
N12.013c/ ākṣipto moghabījaś ca śālīno 'nyapatis tathā || 13 ||
N12.014a/ tatrādyāv apratīkarau pakṣākhyo māsam ācaret |
N12.014c/ anukramāt trayasyāsya kālaḥ saṁvatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ || 14 ||
N12.015a/ īrṣyāpaṇḍādayo ye 'nye catvāraḥ samudāhṛtāḥ |
N12.015c/ santyaktavyāḥ patitavat kṣatayonyā api striyāḥ || 15 ||
N12.016a/ ākṣiptamoghabījābhyām patyāv apratikarmaṇi |
N12.016c/ patir anyaḥ smṛto nāryā vatsaraṁ sampratīkṣya tu || 16 ||
N12.017a/ śālīnasyāpi dhṛṣṭastrīsaṁyogād bhajyate dhvajaḥ |
N12.017c/ taṁ hīnavegam anyastrībālādyābhir upakramet || 17 ||
N12.018a/ anyasyām yo manuṣyaḥ syād amanuṣyaḥ svayoṣiti |
N12.018c/ labheta sānyaṁ bhartāram etat kāryaṁ prajāpateḥ || 18 ||
N12.019a/ apatyārthaṁ striyaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ strī kṣetraṁ bījinaḥ prajāḥ |
N12.019c/ kṣetraṁ bījavate deyaṁ nābījī kṣetram arhati || 19 ||
N12.020a/ pitā dadyāt svayaṁ kanyām bhrātā vānumate pituḥ |
N12.020c/ mātāmaho mātulaś ca sakulyā bāndhavās tathā || 20 ||
N12.021a/ mātābhāve tu sarveṣāṁ prakṛtau yadi vartate |
N12.021c/ tasyām aprakṛtisthāyāṁ dadyuḥ kanyāṁ svajātayaḥ || 21 ||
N12.022a/ yadā tu naiva kaścit syāt kanyā rājānam āvrajet |
N12.022c/ anujñayā tasya varaṁ pratītya varayet svayam || 22 ||
N12.023a/ savarṇam anurūpaṁ ca kularūpavayaḥśrutaiḥ |
N12.023c/ saha dharmaṁ caret tena putrāṁś cotpādayet tataḥ || 23 ||
N12.024a/ pratigṛhya ca yaḥ kanyāṁ naro deśāntaraṁ vrajet |
N12.024c/ trīn ṛtūn samatikramya kanyānyaṁ varayed varam || 24 ||
N12.025a/ kanyā nartum upekṣeta bāndhavebhyo nivedayet |
N12.025c/ te cen na dadyus tāṁ bhartre te syur bhrūṇahabhiḥ samāḥ || 25 ||
N12.026a/ yāvantaś ca rtavas tasyāḥ samatītā patiṁ vinā |
N12.026c/ tāvatyo bhrūṇahatyāḥ syus tasya yo na dadāti tām || 26 ||
N12.027a/ ato 'pravṛtte rajasi kanyāṁ dadyāt pitā sakṛt |
N12.027c/ mahad enaḥ spṛśed enam anyathaiṣa vidhiḥ satām || 27 ||
N12.028a/ sakṛd aṁśo nipatati sakṛt kanyā pradīyate |
N12.028c/ sakṛd āha dadānīti trīṇy etāni sakṛt sakṛt || 28 ||
N12.029a/ brāhmādiṣu vivāheṣu pañcasv eṣu vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
N12.029c/ guṇāpekṣaṁ bhaved dānam āsurādiṣu ca triṣu || 29 ||
N12.030a/ kanyāyām prāptaśulkāyāṁ jyāyāṁś ced vara āvrajet |
N12.030c/ dharmārthakāmasaṁyuktaṁ vācyaṁ tatrānṛtaṁ bhavet || 30 ||
N12.031a/ nāduṣṭāṁ dūṣayet kanyāṁ nāduṣṭaṁ dūṣayed varam |
N12.031c/ doṣe tu sati nāgaḥ syād anyonyaṁ tyajatos tayoḥ || 31 ||
N12.032a/ dattvā nyāyena yaḥ kanyāṁ varāya na dadāti tām |
N12.032c/ aduṣṭaś ced varo rājñā sa daṇḍyas tatra coravat || 32 ||
N12.033a/ yas tu doṣavatīṁ kanyām anākhyāya prayacchati |
N12.033c/ tasya kuryān nṛpo daṇḍaṁ pūrvasāhasacoditam || 33 ||
N12.034a/ akanyeti tu yaḥ kanyāṁ brūyād dveṣeṇa mānavaḥ |
N12.034c/ sa śataṁ prāpnuyād daṇḍaṁ tasyā doṣam adarśayan || 34 ||
N12.035a/ pratigṛhya tu yaḥ kanyām aduṣṭām utsṛjed varaḥ |
N12.035c/ vineyaḥ so 'py akāmo 'pi kanyāṁ tām eva codvahet || 35 ||
N12.036a/ dīrghakutsitarogārtā vyaṅgā saṁsṛṣṭamaithunā |
N12.036c/ dhṛṣṭānyagatabhāvā ca kanyādoṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 36 ||
N12.037a/ unmattaḥ patitaḥ klībo durbhagas tyaktabāndhavaḥ |
N12.037c/ kanyādoṣau ca yau pūrvau eṣa doṣagaṇo vare || 37 ||
N12.038a/ aṣṭau vivāhā varṇānāṁ saṁskārārthaṁ prakīrtitāḥ |
N12.038c/ brāhmas tu prathamas teṣāṁ prājāpatyas tathaiva ca || 38 ||
N12.039a/ ārṣaś caivātha daivaś ca gāndharvaś cāsuras tathā |
N12.039c/ rākṣaso 'nantaras tasmāt paiśācas tv aṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ || 39 ||
N12.040a/ satkṛtyāhūya kanyāṁ tu brāhme dadyād tv alaṅkṛtām |
N12.040c/ saha dharmaṁ carety uktvā prājāpatyo vidhīyate || 40 ||
N12.041a/ vastragomithune dattvā vivāhas tv ārṣa ucyate |
N12.041c/ antarvedyāṁ tu daivaḥ syād ṛtvije karma kurvate || 41 ||
N12.042a/ icchantīm icchate prāhur gāndharvo nāma pañcamam |
N12.042c/ vivāhas tv āsuro jñeyaḥ śulkasaṁvyavahārataḥ || 42 ||
N12.043a/ prasahya haraṇād ukto vivāho rākṣasas tathā |
N12.043c/ suptamattopagamanāt paiśācas tv aṣṭamo 'dhamaḥ || 43 ||
N12.044a/ eṣāṁ tu dharmyās catvāro brāhmādyāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ |
N12.044c/ sādhāraṇaḥ syād gāndharvas trayo 'dharmyās tv ataḥ pare || 44 ||
N12.045a/ parapūrvāḥ striyas tv anyāḥ sapta proktā yathākramam |
N12.045c/ punarbhūs trividhā tāsāṁ svairiṇī tu caturvidhā || 45 ||
N12.046a/ kanyaivākṣatayonir yā pāṇigrahaṇadūṣitā |
N12.046c/ punarbhūḥ prathamā soktā punaḥ saṁskāram arhati || 46 ||
N12.047a/ kaumāraṁ patim utsṛjya yānyaṁ puruṣam āśritā |
N12.047c/ punaḥ patyur gṛham yāyāt sā dvitīyā prakīrtitā || 47 ||
N12.048a/ asatsu devareṣu strī bāndhavair yā pradīyate |
N12.048c/ savarṇāyāsapiṇḍāya sā tṛtīyā prakīrtitā || 48 ||
N12.049a/ strī prasūtāprasūtā vā patyāv eva tu jīvati |
N12.049c/ kāmāt samāśrayed anyaṁ prathamā svairiṇī tu sā || 49 ||
N12.050a/ mṛte bhartari yā prāptān devarān apy apāsya tu |
N12.050c/ upagacchet paraṁ kāmāt sā dvitīyā prakīrtitā || 50 ||
N12.051a/ prāptā deśād dhanakrītā kṣutpipāsāturā ca yā |
N12.051c/ tavāham ity upagatā sā tṛtīyā prakīrtitā || 51 ||
N12.052a/ deśadharmān apekṣya strī gurubhir yā pradīyate |
N12.052c/ utpannasāhasānyasmai sāntyā vai svairiṇī smṛtā || 52 ||
N12.053a/ punarbhuvāṁ eṣa vidhiḥ svairiṇīnāṁ ca kīrtitaḥ |
N12.053c/ pūrvā pūrvājaghanyāsāṁ śreyasī tūttarottarā || 53 ||
N12.054a/ apatyam utpādayitus tāsāṁ yā śulkato hṛtā |
N12.054c/ aśulkopanatāyāṁ tu kṣetrikasyaiva tat phalam || 54 ||
N12.055a/ kṣetrikasya yad ajñātaṁ kṣetre bījaṁ pradīyate |
N12.055c/ na tatra bījino bhāgaḥ kṣetrikasyaiva tad bhavet || 55 ||
N12.056a/ oghavātāhṛtaṁ bījaṁ kṣetre yasya prarohati |
N12.056c/ phalabhug yasya tat kṣetraṁ na bījī phalabhāg bhavet || 56 ||
N12.057a/ mahokṣo janayed vatsān yasya goṣu vraje caran |
N12.057c/ tasya te yasya tā gāvo moghaṁ syanditam ārṣabham || 57 ||
N12.058a/ kṣetrikānumataṁ bījaṁ yasya kṣetre pramucyate |
N12.058c/ tadapatyaṁ dvayor eva bījikṣetrikayor matam || 58 ||
N12.059a/ narte kṣetraṁ bhavet sasyaṁ na ca bījaṁ vināsti tat |
N12.059c/ ato 'patyaṁ dvayor iṣṭaṁ pitur mātuś ca dharmataḥ || 59 ||
N12.060a/ nāthavatyā paragṛhe saṁyuktasya striyā saha |
N12.060c/ dṛṣṭaṁ saṅgrahaṇaṁ tajjñair nāgatāyāḥ svayaṁ gṛhe || 60 ||
N12.061a/ praduṣṭatyaktadārasya klībasya kṣamakasya ca |
N12.061c/ svecchayopeyuṣo dārān na doṣaḥ sāhaso bhavet || 61 ||
N12.062a/ parastriyā sahākāle 'deśe vā bhavato mithaḥ |
N12.062c/ sthānasambhāṣaṇāmodās trayaḥ saṅgrahaṇakramāḥ || 62 ||
N12.063a/ nadīnāṁ saṅgame tīrtheṣv ārāmeṣu vaneṣu ca |
N12.063c/ strī pumāṁś ca sameyātāṁ grāhyaṁ saṅgrahaṇaṁ bhavet || 63 ||
N12.064a/ dūtīprasthāpanaiś caiva lekhāsampreṣaṇair api |
N12.064c/ anyair api vyabhicāraiḥ sarvaṁ saṅgrahaṇaṁ smṛtam || 64 ||
N12.065a/ striyaṁ spṛśed adeśe yaḥ spṛṣṭo vā marśayet tathā |
N12.065c/ parasparasyānumate tac ca saṅgrahaṇaṁ bhavet || 65 ||
N12.066a/ bhakṣair vā yadi vā bhojyair vastrair mālyais tathaiva ca |
N12.066c/ sampreṣyamānair gandhaiś ca sarvaṁ saṅgrahaṇaṁ smṛtam || 66 ||
N12.067a/ darpād vā yadi vā mohāc chlāghayā vā svayaṁ vadet |
N12.067c/ mameyaṁ bhuktapūrveti sarvaṁ saṅgrahaṇaṁ smṛtam || 67 ||
N12.068a/ pāṇau yaś ca nigṛhṇīyad veṇyāṁ vastrāntare 'pi vā |
N12.068c/ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti vā bruyāt sarvaṁ saṅgrahaṇaṁ smṛtam || 68 ||
N12.069a/ svajātyatikrame puṁsāṁ uktam uttamasāhasam |
N12.069c/ viparyaye madhyamas tu prātilome pramāpaṇam || 69 ||
N12.070a/ kanyāyām asakāmāyāṁ dvyāṅgulasyāvakartanam |
N12.070c/ uttamāyāṁ vadhas tv eva sarvasvaharaṇaṁ tathā || 70 ||
N12.071a/ sakāmāyāṁ tu kanyāyāṁ savarṇe nāsty atikramaḥ |
N12.071c/ kintv alaṅkṛtya satkṛtya sa evaināṁ samudvahet || 71 ||
N12.072a/ mātā mātṛṣvasā śvaśrūr mātulānī pitṛṣvasā |
N12.072c/ pitṛvyasakhiśiṣyastrī bhaginī tatsakhī snuṣā || 72 ||
N12.073a/ duhitācāryabhāryā ca sagotrā śaraṇāgatā |
N12.073c/ rājñī pravrajitā dhātrī sādhvī varṇottamā ca yā || 73 ||
N12.074a/ āsām anyatamāṁ gatvā gurutalpaga ucyate |
N12.074c/ śiśnasyotkartanaṁ daṇḍo nānyas tatra vidhīyate || 74 ||
N12.075a/ paśuyonyām atikrāman vineyaḥ sa damaṁ śatam |
N12.075c/ madhyamaṁ sāhasaṁ goṣu tad evāntyāvasāyiṣu || 75 ||
N12.076a/ agamyāgāminaḥ śāsti daṇḍo rājñā pracoditaḥ |
N12.076c/ prāyaścittavidhāv atra prāyaścittaṁ viśodhanam || 76 ||
N12.077a/ svairiṇy abrāhmaṇī veśyā dāsī niṣkāsinī ca yā |
N12.077c/ gamyāḥ syur ānulomyena striyo na pratilomataḥ || 77 ||
N12.078a/ āsv eva tu bhujiṣyāsu doṣaḥ syāt paradāravat |
N12.078c/ gamyā api hi nopeyās tāś ced anyaparigrahāḥ || 78 ||
N12.079a/ anutpannaprajāyās tu patiḥ preyād yadi striyāḥ |
N12.079c/ niyuktā gurubhir gacched devaraṁ putrakāmyayā || 79 ||
N12.080a/ sa ca tāṁ pratipadyeta tathaivā putrajanmataḥ |
N12.080c/ putre jāte nivarteta viplavaḥ syād ato 'nyathā || 80 ||
N12.081a/ ghṛtenābhyajya gātrāṇi tailenāvikṛtena vā |
N12.081c/ mukhān mukhaṁ pariharan gātrair gātrāṇy asaṁspṛśan || 81 ||
N12.082a/ striyaṁ putravatīṁ vandhyāṁ nīrajaskām anicchantīm |
N12.082c/ na gacched garbhiṇīṁ nindyām aniyuktāṁ ca bandhubhiḥ || 82 ||
N12.083a/ aniyuktā tu yā nārī devarāj janayet sutam |
N12.083c/ jārajātam arikthīyaṁ tam āhur dharmavādinaḥ || 83 ||
N12.084a/ tathāniyukto bhāryāyāṁ yavīyāñ jyāyaso vrajet |
N12.084c/ yavīyaso vā yo jyāyān ubhau tau gurutalpagau || 84 ||
N12.085a/ kule tadavaśeṣe tu santānārthaṁ na kāmataḥ |
N12.085c/ niyukto gurubhir gacched bhrātṛbhāryāṁ yavīyasaḥ || 85 ||
