N12.086a/ avidyamāne tu gurau rājño vācyaḥ kulakṣayaḥ |
N12.086c/ tatas tadvacanād gacched anuśiṣya striyā saha || 86 ||
N12.087a/ pūrvoktenaiva vidhinā snātāṁ puṁsavane śuciḥ |
N12.087c/ sakṛd ā garbhādhānād vā kṛte garbhe snuṣaiva sā || 87 ||
N12.088a/ ato 'nyathā vartamānaḥ pumān strī vāpi kāmataḥ |
N12.088c/ vineyau subhṛśaṁ rājñā kilbiṣī syād anigrahāt || 88 ||
N12.089a/ īrṣyāsūyasamutthe tu saṁrambhe rāgahetuke |
N12.089c/ dampatī vivadeyātāṁ na jñātiṣu na rājani || 89 ||
N12.090a/ anyonyaṁ tyajator nāgaḥ syād anyonyaviruddhayoḥ |
N12.090c/ strīpuṁsayor nigūḍhāyā vyabhicārād ṛte striyāḥ || 90 ||
N12.091a/ vyabhicāre striyā mauṇḍyam adhaḥśayanam eva ca |
N12.091c/ kadannaṁ vā kuvāsaś ca karma cāvaskaroñjhanam || 91 ||
N12.092a/ strīdhanabhraṣṭasarvasvāṁ garbhavisraṁsinīṁ tathā |
N12.092c/ bhartuś ca vadham icchantīṁ striyaṁ nirvāsayed gṛhāt || 92 ||
N12.093a/ anarthaśīlāṁ satataṁ tathaivāpriyavādinīm |
N12.093c/ pūrvāśinīṁ ca yā bhartuḥ striyaṁ nirvāsayed budhaḥ || 93 ||
N12.094a/ vandhyāṁ strījananīṁ nindyāṁ pratikulāṁ ca sarvadā |
N12.094c/ kāmato nābhinandeta kurvann evaṁ sa doṣabhāk || 94 ||
N12.095a/ anukūlām avāgduṣṭāṁ dakṣāṁ sādhvīṁ prajāvatīm |
N12.095c/ tyajan bhāryām avasthāpyo rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā || 95 ||
N12.096a/ ajñātadoṣeṇoḍhā yā nirgatā nānyam āśritā |
N12.096c/ bandhubhiḥ sā niyoktavyā nirbandhuḥ svayam āśrayet || 96 ||
N12.097a/ naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe ca patite patau |
N12.097c/ pañcasv āpatsu nārīṇāṁ patir anyo vidhīyate || 97 ||
N12.098a/ aṣṭau varṣāṇy udīkṣeta brāhmaṇī proṣitaṁ patim |
N12.098c/ aprasūtā tu catvāri parato 'nyaṁ samāśrayet || 98 ||
N12.099a/ kṣatriyā ṣaṭ samās tiṣṭhed aprasūtā samātrayam |
N12.099c/ vaiśyā prasūtā catvāri dve same tv itarā vaset || 99 ||
N12.100a/ na śūdrāyāḥ smṛtaḥ kālo na ca dharmavyatikramaḥ |
N12.100c/ viśeṣato 'prasūtāyāḥ saṁvatsaraparā sthitiḥ || 100 ||
N12.101a/ apravṛttau smṛtaḥ dharma eṣa proṣitayoṣitām |
N12.101c/ jīvati śrūyamāṇe tu syād eṣa dviguṇo vidhiḥ || 101 ||
N12.102a/ prajāpravṛttau bhūtānāṁ sṛṣṭir eṣā prajāpateḥ |
N12.102c/ ato 'nyagamane strīṇām evaṁ doṣo na vidyate || 102 ||
N12.103a/ ānulomyena varṇānāṁ yaj janma sa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
N12.103c/ prātilomyena yaj janma sa jñeyo varṇasaṅkaraḥ || 103 ||
N12.104a/ anantaraḥ smṛtaḥ putraḥ putra ekāntaras tathā |
N12.104c/ dvyantaraś cānulomyena tathaiva pratilomataḥ || 104 ||
N12.105a/ ugraḥ pāraśavaś caiva niṣādaś cānulomataḥ |
N12.105c/ uttamebhyas trayas tribhyaḥ śūdrāputrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 105 ||
N12.106a/ brāhmaṇyā api cāṇḍālasūtavaidehakā api |
N12.106c/ aparebhyas trayas tribhyā vijñeyaḥ pratilomataḥ || 106 ||
N12.107a/ ambaṣṭho māgadhaś caiva kṣattā ca kṣatriyāsutāḥ |
N12.107c/ ānulomyena tatraiko dvau jñeyau pratilomataḥ || 107 ||
N12.108a/ vaiśyāputrās tu dauṣṣantayavanāyogavā api |
N12.108c/ prātilomyena yatraiko dvau jñeyau cānulomajau || 108 ||
N12.109a/ sūtādyāḥ pratilomās tu ye jātipratilomajāḥ |
N12.109c/ te saṅkarāḥ śvapākādyās teṣāṁ triḥ saptako gaṇaḥ || 109 ||
N12.110a/ savarṇo brāhmaṇīputraḥ kṣatriyāyām anantaraḥ |
N12.110c/ ambaṣṭhograu tathā putrāv evaṁ kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ || 110 ||
N12.111a/ ekāntaras tu dauṣṣanto vaiśyāyāṁ brāhmaṇāt sutaḥ |
N12.111c/ śūdrāyāṁ kṣatriyāt tadvan niṣādo nāma jāyate || 111 ||
N12.112a/ śūdrā pāraśavaṁ sūte brāhmaṇād uttaraṁ sutam |
N12.112c/ ānulomyena varṇānāṁ putrā hy ete prakīrtitāḥ || 112 ||
N12.113a/ sūtaś ca māgadhaś caiva putrāv āyogavas tathā |
N12.113c/ prātilomyena varṇānāṁ tadvad ete 'py anantarāḥ || 113 ||
N12.114a/ anantaraḥ smṛtaḥ sūto brāhmaṇyāṁ kṣatriyāt sutaḥ |
N12.114c/ māgadhāyogavau tadvad dvī putrau vaiśyaśūdrayoḥ || 114 ||
N12.115a/ brāhmaṇy ekāntaraṁ vaiśyāt sūte vaidehakaṁ sutam |
N12.115c/ kṣattāraṁ kṣatriyā śūdrāt putram ekāntaraṁ tathā || 115 ||
N12.116a/ dvyantaraḥ prātilomyena pāpiṣṭhaḥ sati saṅkare |
N12.116c/ cāṇḍālo jāyate śūdrād brāhmaṇī yatra muhyati || 116 ||
N12.117a/ rājñā parīkṣyaṁ na yathā jāyate varṇasaṅkaraḥ |
N12.117c/ tasmād rājñā viśeṣeṇa trayī rakṣyā tu saṅkarāt || 117 ||
N13.001a/ vibhāgo 'rthasya pitryasya putrair yatra prakalpyate |
N13.001c/ dāyabhāga iti proktaṁ tad vivādapadaṁ budhaiḥ || 1 ||
N13.002a/ pitary ūrdhvaṁ mṛte putrā vibhajeyur dhanaṁ pituḥ |
N13.002c/ mātur duhitaro 'bhāve duhitÏṛṇāṁ tadanvayaḥ || 2 ||
N13.003a/ mātur nivṛtte rajasi prattāsu bhaginīṣu ca |
N13.003c/ niraṣṭe vāpy amaraṇe pitary uparataspṛhe || 3 ||
N13.004a/ pitaiva vā svayaṁ putrān vibhajed vayasi sthitaḥ |
N13.004c/ jyeṣṭhaṁ śreṣṭhavibhāgena yathā vāsya matir bhavet || 4 ||
N13.005a/ bibhṛyād vecchataḥ sarvāñ jyeṣṭho bhrātā yathā pitā |
N13.005c/ bhrātā śaktaḥ kaniṣṭho vā śaktyapekṣaḥ kule kriyā || 5 ||
N13.006a/ śauryabhāryādhane hitvā yac ca vidyādhanaṁ bhavet |
N13.006c/ trīṇy etāny avibhājyāni prasādo yaś ca paitṛkaḥ || 6 ||
N13.007a/ mātrā ca svadhanaṁ dattaṁ yasmai syāt prītipūrvakam |
N13.007c/ tasyāpy eṣa vidhir dṛṣṭo mātāpīṣṭe yathā pitā || 7 ||
N13.008a/ adhyagnyadhyāvahanikaṁ bhartṛdāyas tathaiva ca |
N13.008c/ bhrātṛmātṛpitṛbhyaś ca ṣaḍvidhaṁ strīdhanaṁ smṛtam || 8 ||
N13.009a/ strīdhanaṁ tadapatyānāṁ bhartṛgāmy aprajāsu ca |
N13.009c/ brāhmādiṣu catuḥṣv āhuḥ pitṛgāmītareṣu tu || 9 ||
N13.010a/ kuṭumbaṁ bibhṛyād bhrātur yo vidyām adhigacchataḥ |
N13.010c/ bhāgaṁ vidyādhanāt tasmāt sa labhetāśruto 'pi san || 10 ||
N13.011a/ vaidyo 'vaidyāya nākāmo dadyād aṁśaṁ svato dhanāt |
N13.011c/ pitṛdravyaṁ tad āśritya na cet tena tad āhṛtam || 11 ||
N13.012a/ dvāv āṁśau pratipadyeta vibhajann ātmanaḥ pitā |
N13.012c/ samāṁśabhāginī mātā putrāṇāṁ syān mṛte patau || 12 ||
N13.013a/ jyeṣṭhāyāṁśo 'dhiko deyaḥ jyeṣṭhāya tu varaḥ smṛtaḥ |
N13.013c/ samāṁśabhājaḥ śeṣāḥ syur aprattā bhaginī tathā || 13 ||
N13.014a/ kṣetrajeṣv api putreṣu tadvaj jāteṣu dharmataḥ |
N13.014c/ varṇāvareṣv aṁśahānir ūḍhājāteṣv anukramāt || 14 ||
N13.015a/ pitraiva tu vibhaktā ye hīnādhikasamair dhanaiḥ |
N13.015c/ teṣāṁ sa eva dharmaḥ syāt sarvasya hi pitā prabhuḥ || 15 ||
N13.016a/ kānīnaś ca sahoḍhaś ca gūḍhāyāṁ yaś ca jāyate |
N13.016c/ teṣāṁ voḍhāpitā jñeyas te ca bhāgaharāḥ smṛtāḥ || 16 ||
N13.017a/ ajñātapitṛko yaś ca kānīno 'nūḍhamātṛkaḥ |
N13.017c/ mātāmahāya dadyāt sa piṇḍaṁ rikthaṁ hareta ca || 17 ||
N13.018a/ jātā ye tv aniyuktāyām ekena bahubhis tathā |
N13.018c/ arikthabhājas te sarve bījinām eva te sutāḥ || 18 ||
N13.019a/ dadyus te bījine piṇḍaṁ mātā cec chulkato hṛtā |
N13.019c/ aśulkopagatāyāṁ tu piṇḍadā voḍhur eva te || 19 ||
N13.020a/ pitṛdviṭ patitaḥ paṇḍo yaś ca syād aupapātikaḥ |
N13.020c/ aurasā api naite 'ṁśaṁ labheran kṣetrajāḥ kutaḥ || 20 ||
N13.021a/ dīrghatīvrāmayagrastā jaḍonmattāndhapaṅgavaḥ |
N13.021c/ bhartavyāḥ syuḥ kule caite tatputrās tv aṁśabhāginaḥ || 21 ||
N13.022a/ dvirāmuṣyāyaṇā dadyur dvābhyāṁ piṇḍodake pṛthak |
N13.022c/ rikthād ardhāṁśam ādadyur bījikṣetrikayos tathā || 22 ||
N13.023a/ saṁsṛṣṭināṁ tu yo bhāgas teṣām eva sa iṣyate |
N13.023c/ ato 'nyathāṁśabhājo hi nirbījiṣv itarān iyāt || 23 ||
N13.024a/ bhrātÏṛṇām aprajaḥ preyāt kaścic cet pravrajet tu vā |
N13.024c/ vibhajeyur dhanaṁ tasya śeṣās tu strīdhanaṁ vinā || 24 ||
N13.025a/ bharaṇam cāsya kurvīran strīṇām ā jīvitakṣayāt |
N13.025c/ rakṣanti śayyāṁ bhartuś ced ācchindyur itarāsu tu || 25 ||
N13.026a/ syād yasya duhitā tasyāḥ pitraṁśo bharaṇe mataḥ |
N13.026c/ ā saṁskārād bhajed enāṁ parato bibhṛyāt patiḥ || 26 ||
N13.027a/ mṛte bhartary aputrāyāḥ patipakṣaḥ prabhuḥ striyāḥ |
N13.027c/ viniyogātmarakṣāsu bharaṇe ca sa īśvaraḥ || 27 ||
N13.028a/ parikṣīṇe patikule nirmaṇuṣye nirāśraye |
N13.028c/ tatsapiṇḍeṣu vāsatsu pitṛpakṣaḥ prabhuḥ striyāḥ || 28 ||
N13.029a/ pakṣadvayāvasāne tu rājā bhartā smṛtaḥ striyāḥ |
N13.029c/ sa tasyā bharaṇaṁ kuryān nigṛhṇīyāt pathaś cyutām || 29 ||
N13.030a/ svātantryād vipraṇaśyanti kule jātā api striyaḥ |
N13.030c/ asvātantryam atas tāsāṁ prajāpatir akalpayat || 30 ||
N13.031a/ pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane |
N13.031c/ putrā rakṣanti vaidhavye na strī svātantryam arhati || 31 ||
N13.032a/ yac chiṣṭaṁ pitṛdāyebhyo dattva rṇaṁ paitṛkaṁ ca yat |
N13.032c/ bhrātṛbhis tad vibhaktavyam ṛṇī na syād yathā pitā || 32 ||
N13.033a/ yeṣāṁ ca na kṛtāḥ pitrā saṁskāravidhayaḥ kramāt |
N13.033c/ kartavyā bhrātṛbhis teṣāṁ paitṛkād eva te dhanāt || 33 ||
N13.034a/ avidyamāne pitrye 'rthe svāṁśād uddhṛtya vā punaḥ |
N13.034c/ avaśyakāryāḥ saṁskārā bhrātÏṛṇāṁ pūrvasaṁskṛtaiḥ || 34 ||
N13.035a/ kuṭumbārtheṣu codyuktas tatkāryaṁ kurute ca yaḥ |
N13.035c/ sa bhrātṛbhir bṛṁhaṇīyo grāsāchādanavāhanaiḥ || 35 ||
N13.036a/ vibhāgadharmasandehe dāyādānāṁ vinirṇaye |
N13.036c/ jñātibhir bhāgalekhyaiś ca pṛthakkāryapravartanāt || 36 ||
N13.037a/ bhrātÏṛṇām avibhaktānām eko dharmaḥ pravartate |
N13.037c/ vibhāge sati dharmo 'pi bhaved eṣāṁ pṛthak pṛthak || 37 ||
N13.038a/ dānagrahaṇapaśvannagṛhakṣetraparigrahāḥ |
N13.038c/ vibhaktānāṁ pṛthag jñeyāḥ pākadharmāgamavyayāḥ || 38 ||
N13.039a/ sākṣitvaṁ prātibhāvyaṁ ca dānaṁ grahaṇam eva ca |
N13.039c/ vibhaktā bhrātaraḥ kūryur nāvibhaktā parasparam || 39 ||
N13.040a/ yeṣām etāḥ kriyā loke pravartante svarikthinām |
N13.040c/ vibhaktān avagaccheyur lekhyam apy antareṇa tān || 40 ||
N13.041a/ yady ekajātā bahavaḥ pṛthagdharmāḥ pṛthakkriyāḥ |
N13.041c/ pṛthakkarmaguṇopetā na te kṛtyeṣu sammatāḥ || 41 ||
N13.042a/ svān bhāgān yadi dadyus te vikrīṇīrann athāpi vā |
N13.042c/ kuryur yatheṣṭaṁ tat sarvam īśante svadhanasya te || 42 ||
N13.043a/ aurasaḥ kṣetrajaś caiva putrikāputra eva ca |
N13.043c/ kānīnaś ca sahoḍhaś ca gūḍhotpannas tathaiva ca || 43 ||
N13.044a/ paunarbhavo 'paviddhaś ca labdhaḥ krītaḥ kṛtas tathā |
N13.044c/ svayaṁ copagataḥ putrā dvādaśaita udāhṛtāḥ || 44 ||
N13.045a/ teṣāṁ ṣaḍ bandhudāyādāḥ ṣaḍ adāyādabāndhavāḥ |
N13.045c/ pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ smṛtaḥ śreyāj jaghanyo yo ya uttaraḥ || 45 ||
N13.046a/ kramād dhy ete prapadyeran mṛte pitari taddhanam |
N13.046c/ jyāyaso jyāyaso 'bhāve jaghanyas tad avāpnuyāt || 46 ||
N13.047a/ putrābhāve tu duhitā tulyasantānadarśanāt |
N13.047c/ putraś ca duhitā coktau pituḥ santānakārakau || 47 ||
N13.048a/ abhāve tu duhitṝṇāṁ sakulyā bāndhavās tataḥ |
N13.048c/ tataḥ sajātyāḥ sarveṣām abhāve rājagāmi tat || 48 ||
N13.049a/ anyatra brāhmaṇāt kintu rājā dharmaparāyaṇaḥ |
N13.049c/ sa strīṇāṁ jīvanaṁ dadyād eṣa dāyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ || 49 ||
N14.001a/ sahasā kriyate karma yatkiñcid baladarpitaiḥ |
N14.001c/ tat sāhasam iti proktaṁ saho balam ihocyate || 1 ||
N14.002a/ tat punas trividhaṁ jñeyaṁ prathamaṁ madhyamaṁ tathā |
N14.002c/ uttamaṁ ceti śāstreṣu tasyoktaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ pṛthak || 2 ||
N14.003a/ phalamūlodakādīnāṁ kṣetropakaraṇasya ca |
N14.003c/ bhaṅgākṣepopamardādyaiḥ prathamaṁ sāhasaṁ smṛtam || 3 ||
N14.004a/ vāsaḥpaśvannapānānām gṛhopakaraṇasya ca |
N14.004c/ etenaiva prakāreṇa madhyamaṁ sāhasaṁ smṛtam || 4 ||
N14.005a/ vyāpādo viṣaśastrād yaiḥ paradārapradharṣaṇam |
N14.005c/ prāṇoparodhi yac cānyad uktam uttamasāhasam || 5 ||
N14.006a/ tasya daṇḍaḥ kriyāpekṣaḥ prathamasya śatāvaraḥ |
N14.006c/ madhyamasya tu śāstrajñair jñeyaḥ pañcaśatāvaraḥ || 6 ||
N14.007a/ vadhaḥ sarvasvaharaṇaṁ purān nirvāsanāṅkane |
N14.007c/ tadaṅgaccheda ity ukto daṇḍa uttamasāhase || 7 ||
N14.008a/ aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām eṣa daṇḍavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
N14.008c/ vadhād ṛte brāhmaṇasya na vadhaṁ brāhmaṇo 'rhati || 8 ||
N14.009a/ śiraso muṇḍanaṁ daṇḍas tasya nirvāsanaṁ purāt |
N14.009c/ lalāṭe cābhiśastāṅkaḥ prayāṇaṁ gardabhena ca || 9 ||
N14.010a/ syātāṁ saṁvyavahāryau tau dhṛtadaṇḍau tu pūrvayoḥ |
N14.010c/ dhṛtadaṇḍo 'py asambhojyo jñeya uttamasāhase || 10 ||
N14.011a/ tasyaiva bhedaḥ steyaṁ syād viśeṣas tatra cocyate |
N14.011c/ atisāhasam ākramya steyam āhuś chalena tu || 11 ||
N14.012a/ tad api trividhaṁ proktaṁ dravyāpekṣaṁ manīṣibhiḥ |
N14.012c/ kṣudramadhyottamānāṁ tu dravyāṇām apakarṣaṇāt || 12 ||
N14.013a/ mṛdbhāṇḍāsanakhaṭvāsthidārucarmatṛṇādi yat |
N14.013c/ śamīdhānyamudgādīni kṣudradravyam udāhṛtam || 13 ||
N14.014a/ vāsaḥ kauśeyavarjaṁ ca govarjaṁ paśavas tathā |
N14.014c/ hiraṇyavarjaṁ lohaṁ ca madhyaṁ vrīhiyavā api || 14 ||
N14.015a/ hiraṇyaratnakauśeyastrīpuṅgogajavājinaḥ |
N14.015c/ devabrāhmaṇarājñāṁ ca dravyaṁ vijñeyam uttamam || 15 ||
N14.016a/ upāyair vividhair eṣāṁ chalayitvāpakarṣaṇam |
N14.016c/ suptapramattamattebhyaḥ steyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ || 16 ||
N14.017a/ sahoḍhagrahaṇāt steyaṁ hoḍhe 'saty upabhogataḥ |
N14.017c/ śaṅkā tv asajjanaikārthyād anāyavyayatas tathā || 17 ||
N14.018a/ bhaktāvakāśadātāraḥ stenānāṁ ye prasarpatām |
N14.018c/ śaktāś ca ya upekṣante te 'pi taddoṣabhāginaḥ || 18 ||
N14.019a/ utkrośatāṁ janānāṁ ca hriyamāṇe dhane 'pi ca |
N14.019c/ śrutvā ye nābhidhāvanti te 'pi taddoṣabhāginaḥ || 19 ||
N14.020a/ sāhaseṣu ya evoktas triṣu daṇḍo manīṣibhiḥ |
N14.020c/ sa eva daṇḍaḥ steye 'pi dravyeṣu triṣv anukramāt || 20 ||
N14.021a/ gavādiṣu praṇaṣṭeṣu dravyeṣv apahṛteṣu vā |
N14.021c/ padenānveṣaṇaṁ kuryur ā mūlāt tadvido janāḥ || 21 ||
N14.022a/ grāme vraje vivīte vā yatra sannipatet padam |
N14.022c/ voḍhavyaṁ tad bhavet tena na cet so 'nyatra tan nayet || 22 ||
N14.023a/ pade pramūḍhe bhagne vā viṣamatvāj janāntike |
N14.023c/ yas tv āsannataro grāmo vrajo vā tatra pātayet || 23 ||
N14.024a/ same 'dhvani dvayor yatra tena prāyo 'śucir janaḥ |
N14.024c/ pūrvāpadānair dṛṣṭo vā saṁsṛṣṭo vā durātmabhiḥ || 24 ||
N14.025a/ grāmeṣv anveṣaṇaṁ kuryuś caṇḍālavadhakādayaḥ |
N14.025c/ rātrisañcāriṇo ye ca bahiḥ kuryur bahiścarāḥ || 25 ||
N14.026a/ steneṣv alabhyamāneṣu rājā dadyāt svakād dhanāt |
N14.026c/ upekṣamāṇo hy enasvī dharmād arthāc ca hīyate || 26 ||
N15-16.001a/ deśajātikulādīnām ākrośanyaṅgasaṁhitam |
N15-16.001c/ yad vacaḥ pratikūlārthaṁ vākpāruṣyaṁ tad ucyate || 1 ||
N15-16.002a/ niṣṭhurāślīlatīvratvāt tad api trividhaṁ smṛtam |
N15-16.002c/ gauravānukramād asya daṇḍo 'py atra kramād guruḥ || 2 ||
N15-16.003a/ sākṣepaṁ niṣṭhuraṁ jñeyam aślīlaṁ nyaṅgasaṁyutam |
N15-16.003c/ pātanīyair upakrośais tīvram āhur manīṣiṇaḥ || 3 ||
N15-16.004a/ paragātreṣv abhidroho hastapādāyudhādibhiḥ |
N15-16.004c/ bhasmādibhiś copaghāto daṇḍapāruṣyam ucyate || 4 ||
N15-16.005a/ tasyāpi dṛṣṭaṁ traividhyaṁ mṛdumadhyottamaṁ kramāt |
N15-16.005c/ avagūraṇaniḥsaṅgapātanakṣatadarśanaiḥ || 5 ||
N15-16.006a/ hīnamadhyottamānāṁ tu dravyāṇām samatikramāt |
N15-16.006c/ trīṇy eva sāhasāny āhus tatra kaṇṭakaśodhanam || 6 ||
N15-16.007a/ vidhiḥ pañcavidhas tūkta etayor ubhayor api |
N15-16.007c/ viśuddhir daṇḍabhāktvaṁ ca tatra sambadhyate yathā || 7 ||
N15-16.008a/ pāruṣye sati saṁrambhād utpanne kṣubdhayor dvayoḥ |
N15-16.008c/ sa manyate yaḥ kṣamate daṇḍabhāg yo 'tivartate || 8 ||
N15-16.009a/ pāruṣyadoṣāvṛtayor yugapat sampravṛttayoḥ |
N15-16.009c/ viśeṣaś cen na dṛśyeta vinayaḥ syāt samas tayoḥ || 9 ||
N15-16.010a/ pūrvam ākṣārayed yas tu niyataṁ syāt sa doṣabhāk |
N15-16.010c/ paścād yaḥ so 'py asatkārī pūrve tu vinayo guruḥ || 10 ||
N15-16.011a/ dvayor āpannayos tulyam anubadhnāti yaḥ punaḥ |
N15-16.011c/ sa tayor daṇḍam āpnoti pūrvo vā yadi vetaraḥ || 11 ||
N15-16.012a/ śvapākapaṇḍacaṇḍālavyaṅgeṣu vadhavṛttiṣu |
N15-16.012c/ hastipavrātyadāreṣu gurvācāryāṅganāsu ca || 12 ||
N15-16.013a/ maryādātikrame sadyo ghāta evānuśāsanam |
N15-16.013c/ na ca taddaṇḍapāruṣye doṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ || 13 ||
N15-16.014a/ yam eva hy ativarterann ete santaṁ janaṁ nṛṣu |
N15-16.014c/ sa eva vinayaṁ kuryān na tadvinayabhāṅ nṛpaḥ || 14 ||
N15-16.015a/ malā hy ete manuṣyeṣu dhanam eṣāṁ malātmakam |
N15-16.015c/ api tān ghātayed rājā nārthadaṇḍena daṇḍayet || 15 ||
N15-16.016a/ śataṁ brāhmaṇam ākruśya kṣatriyo daṇḍam arhati |
N15-16.016c/ vaiśyo 'dhyardhaṁ śataṁ dve vā śūdras tu vadham arhati || 16 ||
N15-16.017a/ vipraḥ pañcāśataṁ daṇḍyaḥ kṣatriyasyābhiśaṁsane |
N15-16.017c/ vaiśye syād ardhapañcāśac chūdre dvādaśako damaḥ || 17 ||
N15-16.018a/ samavarṇadvijātīnāṁ dvādaśaiva vyatikrame |
N15-16.018c/ vādeṣv avacanīyeṣu tad eva dviguṇaṁ bhavet || 18 ||
N15-16.019a/ kāṇam apy athavā khañjam anyaṁ vāpi tathāvidham |
N15-16.019c/ tathyenāpi bruvan dāpyo rājñā kārṣāpaṇāvaram || 19 ||
N15-16.020a/ na kilbiṣeṇāpavadec chāstrataḥ kṛtapāvanam |
N15-16.020c/ na rājñā dhṛtadaṇḍaṁ ca daṇḍabhāk tadvyatikramāt || 20 ||
N15-16.021a/ loke 'smin dvāv avaktavyāv adaṇḍyau ca prakīrtitau |
N15-16.021c/ brāhmaṇaś caiva rājā ca tau hīdaṁ bibhṛto jagat || 21 ||
N15-16.022a/ patitaṁ patitety uktvā cauraṁ caureti vā punaḥ |
N15-16.022c/ vacanāt tulyadoṣaḥ syān mithyā dvir doṣatāṁ vrajet || 22 ||
N15-16.023a/ nāmajātigrahaṁ teṣām abhidroheṇa kurvataḥ |
N15-16.023c/ nikheyo 'yomayaḥ śaṅkuḥ śūdrasyāṣṭādaśāṅgulaḥ || 23 ||
N15-16.024a/ dharmāpadeśaṁ darpeṇa dvijānām asya kurvataḥ |
N15-16.024c/ taptam āsecayet tailaṁ vaktre śrotre ca pārthivaḥ || 24 ||
N15-16.025a/ yenāṅgenāvaro varṇo brāhmaṇasyāparādhnuyāt |
N15-16.025c/ tad aṅgaṁ tasya chettavyam evaṁ śuddhim avāpnuyāt || 25 ||
N15-16.026a/ sahāsanam abhiprepsur utkṛṣṭasyāvakṛṣṭajaḥ |
N15-16.026c/ kaṭyāṁ kṛṭāṅko nirvāsyaḥ sphigdeśaṁ vāsya kartayet || 26 ||
N15-16.027a/ avaniṣṭhīvato darpād dvāv oṣṭhau chedayen nṛpaḥ |
N15-16.027c/ avamūtrayataḥ śiśnam avaśardhayato gudam || 27 ||
N15-16.028a/ keśeṣu gṛhṇato hastau chedayed avicārayan |
N15-16.028c/ pādayor nāsikāyāṁ ca grīvāyāṁ vṛṣaṇeṣu ca || 28 ||
N15-16.029a/ upakruśya tu rājānaṁ vartmani sve vyavasthitam |
N15-16.029c/ jihvāchedād bhavec chuddhiḥ sarvasvaharaṇena vā || 29 ||
N15-16.030a/ rājani prahared yas tu kṛtāgasy api durmatiḥ |
N15-16.030c/ śūle tam agnau vipaced brahmahatyāśatādhikam || 30 ||
N15-16.031a/ putrāparādhe na pitā na śvavāñ śuni daṇḍabhāk |
N15-16.031c/ na markaṭe ca tatsvāmī tair eva prahito na cet || 31 ||
N17.001a/ akṣavardhraśalākādyair devanaṁ jihmakāritam |
N17.001c/ paṇakrīḍā vayobhiś ca padaṁ dyūtasamāhvayam || 1 ||
N17.002a/ sabhikaḥ kārayed dyūtaṁ deyaṁ dadyāc ca tatkṛtam |
N17.002c/ daśakaṁ tu śataṁ vṛddhis tasya syād dyūtakāritā || 2 ||
N17.003a/ dvirabhyastāḥ patanty akṣā glahe yasyākṣadevinaḥ |
N17.003c/ jayaṁ tasyāparasyāhuḥ kitavasya parājayam || 3 ||
N17.004a/ kitaveṣv eva tiṣṭheyuḥ kitavāḥ saṁśayaṁ prati |
N17.004c/ ta eva tasya draṣṭāraḥ syus ta eva ca sākṣiṇaḥ || 4 ||
N17.005a/ aśuddhaḥ kitavo nānyad āśrayed dyūtamaṇḍalam |
N17.005c/ pratihanyān na sabhikaṁ dāpayet tat svam iṣṭataḥ || 5 ||
N17.006a/ kūṭākṣadevinaḥ pāpān nirbhajed dyūtamaṇḍalāt |
N17.006c/ kaṇṭhe 'kṣamālām āsajya sa hy eṣāṁ vinayaḥ smṛtaḥ || 6 ||
N18.001a/ prakīrṇake punar jñeyā vyavahārā nṛpāśrayāḥ |
N18.001c/ rājñām ājñāpratīghātas tatkarmakaraṇaṁ tathā || 1 ||
N18.002a/ purapradānaṁ sambhedaḥ prakṛtīnāṁ tathaiva ca |
N18.002c/ pāṣaṇḍanaigamaśreṇīgaṇadharmaviparyayāḥ || 2 ||
N18.003a/ pitṛputravivādaś ca prāyaścittavyatikramaḥ |
N18.003c/ pratigrahavilopaś ca kopa āśramiṇām api || 3 ||
N18.004a/ varṇasaṅkaradoṣaś ca tadvṛttiniyamas tathā |
N18.004c/ na dṛṣṭaṁ yac ca pūrveṣu tat sarvaṁ syāt prakīrṇake || 4 ||
N18.005a/ rājā tv avahitaḥ sarvān āśramān paripālayet |
N18.005c/ upāyaiḥ śāstravihitaiś caturbhiḥ prakṛtais tathā || 5 ||
N18.006a/ yo yo varṇo 'vahīyeta yo vodrekam anuvrajet |
N18.006c/ taṁ taṁ dṛṣṭvā svato mārgāt pracyutaṁ sthāpayet pathi || 6 ||
N18.007a/ aśāstrokteṣu cānyeṣu pāpayukteṣu karmasu |
N18.007c/ prasamīkṣyātmano rājā daṇḍaṁ daṇḍyeṣu pātayet || 7 ||
N18.008a/ śrutismṛtiviruddhaṁ ca janānām ahitaṁ ca yat |
N18.008c/ na tat pravartayed rājā pravṛttaṁ ca nivartayet || 8 ||
N18.009a/ nyāyāpetaṁ yad anyena rājñājñānakṛtaṁ ca yat |
N18.009c/ tad apy anyāyavihitaṁ punar nyāye niveśayet || 9 ||
N18.010a/ rājñā pravartitān dharmānyo naro nānupālayet |
N18.010c/ daṇḍyaḥ sa pāpo vadhyaś ca lopayan rājaśāsanam || 10 ||
N18.011a/ āyudhāny āyudhīyānāṁ vāhyādīn vāhyajīvinām |
N18.011c/ veśyāstrīṇām alaṅkāraṁ vādyātodyāni tadvidām || 11 ||
N18.012a/ yac ca yasyopakaraṇaṁ yena jīvanti kārukāḥ |
N18.012c/ sarvasvaharaṇe 'py etān na rājā hartum arhati || 12 ||
N18.013a/ anādiś cāpy anantaś ca dvipadāṁ pṛthivīpatiḥ |
N18.013c/ dīptimatvāc chucitvāc ca yadi na syāt pathaś cyutaḥ || 13 ||
N18.014a/ yadi rājā na sarveṣāṁ varṇānāṁ daṇḍadhāraṇam |
N18.014c/ kuryāt patho vyapetānāṁ vinaśyeyur imāḥ prajāḥ || 14 ||
N18.015a/ brāhmaṇyaṁ brāhmaṇo jahyāt kṣatriyaḥ kṣātram utsṛjet |
N18.015c/ svakarma jahyād vaiśyas tu śūdraḥ sarvān viśeṣayet || 15 ||
N18.016a/ rājānaś cen nābhaviṣyan pṛthivyāṁ daṇḍadhāraṇam |
N18.016c/ śūle matsyān ivāpakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥ || 16 ||
N18.017a/ satām anugraho nityam asatāṁ nigrahas tathā |
N18.017c/ eṣa dharmaḥ smṛto rājñām arthaś cāmitrapīḍanāt || 17 ||
N18.018a/ na lipyate yathā vahnir dahañ chaśvad imāḥ prajāḥ |
N18.018c/ na lipyate tathā rājā daṇḍaṁ daṇḍyeṣu pātayan || 18 ||
N18.019a/ ājñā tejaḥ pārthivānāṁ sā ca vāci pratiṣṭhitā |
N18.019c/ te yad brūyur asat sad vā sa dharmo vyavahāriṇām || 19 ||
N18.020a/ rājā nāma caraty eṣa bhūmau sākṣāt sahasradṛk |
N18.020c/ na tasyājñām atikramya santiṣṭheran prajāḥ kvacit || 20 ||
N18.021a/ rakṣādhikārād īśatvād bhūtānugrahadarśanāt |
N18.021c/ yad eva rājā kurute tat pramāṇam iti sthitiḥ || 21 ||
N18.022a/ nirguṇo 'pi yathā strīṇāṁ pūjya eva patiḥ sadā |
N18.022c/ prajānāṁ viguṇo 'py evaṁ pūjya eva narādhipaḥ || 22 ||
N18.023a/ tapaḥkrītāḥ prajā rājñā prabhur āsāṁ tato nṛpaḥ |
N18.023c/ tatas tadvacasi stheyaṁ vārtā cāsāṁ tadāśrayā || 23 ||
N18.024a/ pañca rūpāṇi rājāno dhārayanty amitaujasaḥ |
N18.024c/ agner indrasya somasya yamasya dhanadasya ca || 24 ||
N18.025a/ kāraṇād animittaṁ vā yadā krodhavaśaṁ gataḥ |
N18.025c/ prajā dahati bhūpālas tadāgnir abhidhīyate || 25 ||
N18.026a/ yadā tejaḥ samālambya vijigīṣur udāyudhaḥ |
N18.026c/ abhiyāti parān rājā tadendraḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ || 26 ||
N18.027a/ vigatakrodhasantāpo hṛṣṭarūpo yadā nṛpaḥ |
N18.027c/ prajānāṁ darśanaṁ yāti soma ity ucyate tadā || 27 ||
N18.028a/ dharmāsanagataḥ śrīmān daṇḍaṁ dhatte yadā nṛpaḥ |
N18.028c/ samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tadā vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ || 28 ||
N18.029a/ yadā tv arthiguruprājñabhṛtyādīn avanīpatiḥ |
N18.029c/ anugṛhṇāti dānena tadā sa dhanadaḥ smṛtaḥ || 29 ||
N18.030a/ tasmāt taṁ nāvajānīyān nākrośen na viśeṣayet |
N18.030c/ ājñāyāṁ cāsya tiṣṭheta mṛtyuḥ syāt tadvyatikramāt || 30 ||
N18.031a/ tasya vṛttiḥ prajārakṣā vṛddhaprājñopasevanam |
N18.031c/ darśanaṁ vyavahārāṇām ātmanaś cābhirakṣaṇam || 31 ||
N18.032a/ brāhmaṇān upaseveta nityaṁ rājā samāhitaḥ |
N18.032c/ saṁyuktaṁ brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatraṁ mūlaṁ lokābhirakṣaṇe || 32 ||
N18.033a/ brāhmaṇasyāparīhāro rājanyāsanam agrataḥ |
N18.033c/ prathamaṁ darśanaṁ prātaḥ sarvebhyaś cābhivādanam || 33 ||
N18.034a/ agraṁ navebhyaḥ sasyebhyo mārgadānaṁ ca gacchataḥ |
N18.034c/ bhaikṣahetoḥ parāgāre praveśas tv anivāritaḥ || 34 ||
N18.035a/ samitpuṣpodakādāneṣv asteyaṁ saparigrahāt |
N18.035c/ anākṣepaḥ parebhyaś ca sambhāṣaś ca parastriyā || 35 ||
N18.036a/ nadīṣv avetanas tāraḥ pūrvam uttaraṇaṁ tathā |
N18.036c/ tareṣv aśulkadānaṁ ca na ced vāṇijyam asya tat || 36 ||
N18.037a/ vartamāno 'dhvani śrānto gṛhṇann anivasan svayam |
N18.037c/ brāhmaṇo nāparādhnoti dvāv ikṣū pañca mūlakān || 37 ||
N18.038a/ nābhiśastān na patitān na dviṣo na ca nāstikāt |
N18.038c/ na sopadhān nānimittaṁ na dātāraṁ prapīḍya ca || 38 ||
N18.039a/ arthānāṁ bhūribhāvāc ca deyatvāc ca mahātmanām |
N18.039c/ śreyān pratigraho rājñāṁ anyeṣāṁ brāhmaṇād ṛte || 39 ||
N18.040a/ brāhmaṇaś caiva rājā ca dvāv apy etau dhṛtavratau |
N18.040c/ naitayor antaraṁ kiñcit prajādharmābhirakṣaṇāt || 40 ||
N18.041a/ dharmajñasya kṛtajñasya rakṣārthaṁ śāsato 'śucīn |
N18.041c/ medhyam eva dhanaṁ prāhus tīkṣṇasyāpi mahīpateḥ || 41 ||
N18.042a/ śucīnām aśucīnāṁ ca sannipāto yathāmbhasām |
N18.042c/ samudre samatāṁ yāti tadvad rājño dhanāgamaḥ || 42 ||
N18.043a/ yathā cāgnau sthitaṁ dīpte śuddhim āyāti kāñcanam |
N18.043c/ evam evāgamā sarve śuddhim āyānti rājasu || 43 ||
N18.044a/ ya eva kaścit svadravyaṁ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati |
N18.044c/ tad rājñāpy anumantavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ || 44 ||
N18.045a/ anyaprakārād ucitād bhūmeḥ ṣaḍbhāgasañjñitāt |
N18.045c/ baliḥ sa tasya vihitaḥ prajāpālanavetanam || 45 ||
N18.046a/ śakyaṁ tat punar ādātuṁ yad abrāhmaṇasātkṛtam |
N18.046c/ brāhmaṇāya tu yad dattaṁ na tasya haraṇaṁ punaḥ || 46 ||
N18.047a/ dānam adhyayanaṁ yajñas tasya karma trilakṣaṇam |
N18.047c/ yājanādhyāpane vṛttis tṛtīyas tu pratigrahaḥ || 47 ||
N18.048a/ svakarmaṇi dvijas tiṣṭhed vṛttim āhārayet kṛtām |
N18.048c/ nāsadbhyaḥ pratigṛhṇīyād varṇebhyo niyame 'sati || 48 ||
N18.049a/ aśucir vacanād yasya śucir bhavati puruṣaḥ |
N18.049c/ śuciś caivāśuciḥ sadyaḥ kathaṁ rājā na daivatam || 49 ||
N18.050a/ vidur ya eva devatvaṁ rājño hy amitatejasaḥ |
N18.050c/ tasya te pratigṛhṇanto na lipyante dvijātayaḥ || 50 ||
N18.051a/ loke 'smin maṅgalāny aṣṭau brāhmaṇo gaur hutāśanaḥ |
N18.051c/ hiraṇyaṁ sarpir āditya āpo rājā tathāṣṭamaḥ || 51 ||
N18.052a/ etāni satataṁ paśyen namasyed arcayec ca tān |
N18.052c/ pradakṣiṇaṁ ca kurvīta tathā hy āyur na hīyate || 52 ||
N19.001a/ dvividhās taskarā jñeyāḥ paradravyāpahāriṇaḥ |
N19.001c/ prakāśāś cāprakāśāś ca tān vidyād ātmavān nṛpaḥ || 1 ||
N19.002a/ prakāśavañcakās tatra kūṭamānatulāśritāḥ |
N19.002c/ utkoṭakāḥ sāhasikāḥ kitavāḥ paṇyayoṣitaḥ || 2 ||
N19.003a/ pratirūpakarāś caiva maṅgaloddeśavṛttayaḥ |
N19.003c/ ity evamādayo jñeyāḥ prakāśalokavañcakāḥ || 3 ||
N19.004a/ aprakāśāś ca vijñeyā bahirabhyantarāśritāḥ |
N19.004c/ suptān pramattāṁś ca narā muṣṇanty ākramya caiva te || 4 ||
N19.005a/ deśagrāmagṛhaghnāś ca pathighnā granthimocakāḥ |
N19.005c/ ity evamādayo jñeyā aprakāśāś ca taskarāḥ || 5 ||
N19.006a/ tān viditvā sukuśalaiś cārais tatkarmakāribhiḥ |
N19.006c/ anusṛtya gṛhītavyā gūḍhapraṇihitair naraiḥ || 6 ||
N19.007a/ sabhāprapāpūpaśālāveśamadyānnavikrayāḥ |
N19.007c/ catuṣpathāś caityavṛkṣāḥ samājāḥ prekṣaṇāni ca || 7 ||
N19.008a/ śūnyāgārāṇy araṇyāni devatāyatanāni ca |
N19.008c/ cārair vineyāny etāni cauragrahaṇatatparaiḥ || 8 ||
N19.009a/ tathaivānye praṇihitāḥ śraddheyāś citravādinaḥ |
N19.009c/ carā hy utsāhayeyus tāṁs taskarān pūrvataskarāḥ || 9 ||
N19.010a/ annapānasamādānaiḥ samājotsavadarśanaiḥ |
N19.010c/ tathā cauryāpadeśaiś ca kuryus teṣāṁ samāgamam || 10 ||
N19.011a/ ye tatra nopasarpanti sṛtāḥ praṇihitā api |
N19.011c/ te 'bhisārya gṛhītavyāḥ saputrapaśubāndhavāḥ || 11 ||
N19.012a/ yāṁs tatra caurān gṛhṇīyāt tān vitāḍya viḍambya ca |
N19.012c/ avaghuṣya ca sarvatra vadhyāś citravadhena te || 12 ||
N19.013a/ na tv ahoḍhānvitāś caurā rājñā vadhyā hy anāgamāḥ |
N19.013c/ sahoḍhān sopakaraṇān kṣipraṁ caurān praśāsayet || 13 ||
N19.014a/ svadeśaghātino ye syus tathā panthāvarodhinaḥ |
N19.014c/ teṣāṁ sarvasvam ādāya bhūyo nindāṁ prakalpayet || 14 ||
N19.015a/ ahoḍhān vimṛśec caurān gṛhītān pariśaṅkayā |
N19.015c/ bhayopadhābhiś citrābhir brūyus tathā yathākṛtam || 15 ||
N19.016a/ deśaṁ kālaṁ diśaṁ jātiṁ nāma vā sampratiśrayam |
N19.016c/ kṛtyaṁ karmakarā vā syuḥ praṣṭavyās te vinigrahe || 16 ||
N19.017a/ varṇasvarākārabhedāt sasandigdhanivedanāt |
N19.017c/ adeśakāladṛṣṭatvād vāsasyāpy aviśodhanāt || 17 ||
N19.018a/ asadvyayāt pūrvacauryād asatsaṁsargakāraṇāt |
N19.018c/ leśair apy avagantavyā na hoḍhenaiva kevalam || 18 ||
N19.019a/ dasyuvṛtte yadi nare śaṅkā syāt taskare 'pi vā |
N19.019c/ yadi spṛśyeta leśena kāryaḥ syāc chapathaḥ tataḥ || 19 ||
N19.020a/ caurāṇāṁ bhaktadā ye syus tathāgnyudakadāyakāḥ |
N19.020c/ āvāsadā deśikadās tathaivottaradāyakāḥ || 20 ||
N19.021a/ kretāraś caiva bhāṇḍānāṁ pratigrāhiṇa eva ca |
N19.021c/ samadaṇḍāḥ smṛtā hy ete ye ca pracchādayanti tān || 21 ||
N19.022a/ rāṣṭreṣu rāṣṭrādhikṛtāḥ sāmantāś caiva coditāḥ |
N19.022c/ abhyāghāteṣu madhyasthā yathā caurās tathaiva te || 22 ||
N19.023a/ gocare yasya muṣyeta tena caurāḥ prayatnataḥ |
N19.023c/ mṛgyā dāpyo 'nyathā moṣaṁ padaṁ yadi na nirgatam || 23 ||
N19.024a/ nirgate tu pade tasmin naṣṭe 'nyatra nipātite |
N19.024c/ sāmantān mārgapālāṁś ca dikpālāṁś caiva dāpayet || 24 ||
N19.025a/ gṛhe vai muṣite rājā cauragrāhāṁs tu dāpayet |
N19.025c/ ārakṣakān rāṣṭrikāṁś ca yadi cauro na labhyate || 25 ||
N19.026a/ yadi vā dāpyamānānāṁ tasmin moṣe tu saṁśayaḥ |
N19.026c/ muṣitaḥ śapathaṁ śāpyo moṣe vaiśodhyakāraṇāt || 26 ||
N19.027a/ acaure dāpite moṣaṁ cauryavaiśodhyakāraṇāt |
N19.027c/ caure labdhe labheyus te dviguṇaṁ pratipāditāḥ || 27 ||
N19.028a/ caurahṛtaṁ prayatnena sarūpaṁ pratipādayet |
N19.028c/ tadabhāve tu mūlyaṁ syād daṇḍaṁ dāpyaś ca tatsamam || 28 ||
N19.029a/ kāṣṭhakāṇḍatṛṇādīnāṁ mṛnmayānāṁ tathaiva ca |
N19.029c/ veṇuvaiṇavabhāṇḍānāṁ vetrasnāyvasthicarmaṇām || 29 ||
N19.030a/ śākaharitamūlānāṁ haraṇe phalapuṣpayoḥ |
N19.030c/ gorasekṣuvikārāṇāṁ tathā lavaṇatailayoḥ || 30 ||
N19.031a/ pakvānnānāṁ kṛtānnānāṁ madyānām āmiṣasya ca |
N19.031c/ sarveṣām alpamūlyānāṁ mūlyāt pañcaguṇo damaḥ || 31 ||
N19.032a/ tulādharimameyānāṁ gaṇimānāṁ ca sarvaśaḥ |
N19.032c/ ebhyas tūtkṛṣṭamūlyānāṁ mūlyād daśaguṇo damaḥ || 32 ||
N19.033a/ dhānyaṁ daśabhyaḥ kumbhebhyo harato 'bhyadhikaṁ vadhaḥ |
N19.033c/ nyūnaṁ tv ekādaśaguṇaṁ daṇḍaṁ dāpyo 'bravīn manuḥ || 33 ||
N19.034a/ suvarṇarajatādīnām uttamānāṁ ca vāsasām |
N19.034c/ ratnānāṁ caiva mukhyānāṁ śatād abhyadhikaṁ vadhaḥ || 34 ||
N19.035a/ puruṣaṁ harataḥ pātyo daṇḍa uttamasāhasaḥ |
N19.035c/ sarvasvaṁ strīṁ tu harataḥ kanyāṁ tu harato vadhaḥ || 35 ||
N19.036a/ mahāpaśūn stenayato daṇḍa uttamasāhasaḥ |
N19.036c/ madhyamo madhyamapaśuṁ pūrvaḥ kṣudrapaśuṁ haran || 36 ||
N19.037a/ caturviṁśāvaraḥ pūrvaḥ paraḥ ṣaṇṇavatir bhavet |
N19.037c/ śatāni pañca tu paro madhyamo dviśatāvaraḥ || 37 ||
N19.038a/ sahasraṁ tūttamo jñeyaḥ paraḥ pañcaśatāvaraḥ |
N19.038c/ trividhaḥ sāhaseṣv eva daṇḍaḥ proktaḥ svayambhuvā || 38 ||
N19.039a/ prathame granthibhedānām aṅgulyaṅguṣṭhayor vadhaḥ |
N19.039c/ dvitīye caiva taccheṣaṁ daṇḍaḥ pūrvaś ca sāhasaḥ || 39 ||
N19.040a/ goṣu brāhmaṇasaṁsthāsu sthūrāyāś chedanaṁ bhavet |
N19.040c/ dāsīṁ tu harato nityam ardhapādavikartanam || 40 ||
N19.041a/ yena yena viśeṣeṇa stenāṅgena viceṣṭate |
N19.041c/ tat tad evāsya chettavyaṁ tan manor anuśāsanam || 41 ||
N19.042a/ garīyasi garīyāṁsam agarīyasi vā punaḥ |
N19.042c/ stene nipātayed daṇḍaṁ na yathā prathame tathā || 42 ||
N19.043a/ daśa sthānāni daṇḍasya manuḥ svāyambhuvo 'bravīt |
N19.043c/ triṣu varṇeṣu yāni syur brāhmaṇo rakṣitaḥ sadā || 43 ||
N19.044a/ upastham udaraṁ jihvā hastau pādau ca pañcamam |
N19.044c/ cakṣur nāsā ca karṇau ca dhanaṁ dehas tathaiva ca || 44 ||
N19.045a/ aparādhaṁ parijñāya deśakālau ca tattvataḥ |
N19.045c/ sārānubandhāv ālokya daṇḍān etān prakalpayet || 45 ||
N19.046a/ na mitrakāraṇād rājñā vipulād vā dhanāgamāt |
N19.046c/ utsraṣṭavyaḥ sāhasikas tyaktātmā manur abravīt || 46 ||
N19.047a/ yāvān avadhyasya vadhe tāvān vadhyasya mokṣaṇe |
N19.047c/ bhavaty adharmo nṛpater dharmas tu viniyacchataḥ || 47 ||
N19.048a/ na jātu brāhmaṇaṁ hanyāt sarvapāpeṣv api sthitam |
N19.048c/ nirvāsaṁ kārayet kāmam iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ || 48 ||
N19.049a/ sarvasvaṁ vā hared rājā caturthaṁ vāvaśeṣayet |
N19.049c/ bhṛtyebhyo 'nusmaran dharmaṁ prājāpatyam iti sthitiḥ || 49 ||
N19.050a/ brāhmaṇasyāparādhe tu catuḥsv aṅko vidhīyate |
N19.050c/ gurutalpe surāpāne steye brāhmaṇahiṁsane || 50 ||
N19.051a/ gurutalpe bhagaḥ kāryaḥ surāpāne dhvajaḥ smṛtaḥ |
N19.051c/ steye tu śvapadaṁ kṛtvā śikhipittena kūṭayet || 51 ||
N19.052a/ viśirāḥ puruṣaḥ kāryo lalāṭe bhrūṇaghātinaḥ |
N19.052c/ asambhāṣyaś ca kartavyas tan manor anuśāsanam || 52 ||
N19.053a/ rājā stenena gantavyo muktakeśena dhāvatā |
N19.053c/ ācakṣāṇena tatsteyam evaṁ kartāsmi śādhi mām || 53 ||
N19.054a/ anenā bhavati stenaḥ svakarmapratipādanāt |
N19.054c/ rājānaṁ tat spṛśed ena utsṛjantaṁ sakilbiṣam || 54 ||
N19.055a/ rājabhir dhṛtadaṇḍās tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ |
N19.055c/ nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathā || 55 ||
N19.056a/ śāsanād vā vimokṣād vā steno mucyate kilbiṣāt |
N19.056c/ aśāsanāt tu tad rājā stenasyāpnoti kilbiṣam || 56 ||
N19.057a/ gurur ātmavatāṁ śāstā śāstā rājā durātmanām |
N19.057c/ atha pracchannapāpānāṁ śāstā vaivasvato yamaḥ || 57 ||
N19.058a/ aṣṭāpādyaṁ tu śūdrasya steye bhavati kilbiṣam |
N19.058c/ dvir aṣṭāpādyaṁ vaiśyasya dvātriṁśat kṣatriyasya tu || 58 ||
N19.059a/ brāhmaṇasya catuḥṣaṣṭīty evaṁ svāyambhuvo 'bravīt |
N19.059c/ tatrāpi ca viśeṣeṇa vidvatsv abhyadhikaṁ bhavet || 59 ||
N19.060a/ śārīraś cārthadaṇḍaś ca daṇḍas tu dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ |
N19.060c/ śārīrā daśadhā proktā arthadaṇḍās tv anekadhā || 60 ||
N19.061a/ kākaṇyādis tv arthadaṇḍaḥ sarvasvāntas tathaiva ca |
N19.061c/ śārīras tv avarodhādir jīvitāntas tathaiva ca || 61 ||
N19.062a/ kākaṇyādis tu yo daṇḍaḥ sa tu māṣāparaḥ smṛtaḥ |
N19.062c/ māṣāvarādyo yaḥ proktaḥ kārṣāpaṇaparas tu saḥ || 62 ||
N19.063a/ kārṣāpaṇāparādyas tu catuḥkārṣāpaṇaḥ paraḥ |
N19.063c/ dvyavaro 'ṣṭāparaś cānyas tryavaro dvādaśottaraḥ || 63 ||
N19.064a/ kārṣāpaṇādyā ye proktāḥ sarve te syuś caturguṇāḥ |
N19.064c/ evam anye tu vijñeyāḥ prāk ca te pūrvasāhasāt || 64 ||
N19.065a/ kārṣāpaṇo dakṣiṇasyāṁ diśi raupyaḥ pravartate |
N19.065c/ paṇair nibaddhaḥ pūrvasyāṁ ṣoḍaśaiva paṇāḥ sa tu || 65 ||
N19.066a/ māṣo viṁśatibhāgas tu jñeyaḥ kārṣāpaṇasya tu |
N19.066c/ kākaṇī tu caturbhāgo māṣasya ca paṇasya ca || 66 ||
N19.067a/ pāñcanadyāḥ pradeśe tu sañjñā yā vyāvahārikī |
N19.067c/ kārṣāpaṇapramāṇaṁ tu nibaddham iha vai tayā || 67 ||
N19.068a/ kārṣāpaṇo 'ṇḍikā jñeyāś catasras tās tu dhānakaḥ |
N19.068c/ taddvādaśa suvarṇasya dīnāraś citrakaḥ smṛtaḥ || 68 ||

N19.069a/ vārttāṁ trayīṁ cāpy atha daṇḍanītim
rājānuvartet santatāpramattaḥ |

N19.069c/ hanyād upāyair nipuṇair gṛhītān
pure ca rāṣṭre nigṛhṇīyāt pāpān || 69 ||
N20.001a/ yadā sākṣī na vidyate vivāde vadatāṁ nṛṇām |
N20.001c/ tadā divyaiḥ parīkṣeta śapathaiś ca pṛthagvidhaiḥ || 1 ||
N20.002a/ satyaṁ vāhanaśastrāṇi gobījarajatāni ca |
N20.002c/ devatāpitṛpādāś ca dattāni sukṛtāni ca || 2 ||
N20.003a/ mahāparādhe divyāni dāpayet tu mahīpatiḥ |
N20.003c/ alpeṣu ca naraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śapathaiḥ śāpayen naram || 3 ||
N20.004a/ ete hi śapathāḥ proktāḥ sukarās svalpasaṁśaye |
N20.004c/ sāhaseṣv abhiśāpe ca vidhir divyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ || 4 ||
N20.005a/ sandigdhe 'rthe 'bhiyuktānāṁ pracchanneṣu viśeṣataḥ |
N20.005c/ divyaḥ pañcavidho jñeya ity āha bhagavān manuḥ || 5 ||
N20.006a/ dhaṭo 'gnir udakaṁ caiva viṣaṁ kośaś ca pañcamaḥ |
N20.006c/ uktāny etāni divyāni dūṣitānāṁ viśodhane || 6 ||
N20.007a/ sandigdheṣv abhiyuktānāṁ viśuddhyarthaṁ mahātmanā |
N20.007c/ nāradena punaḥ proktāḥ satyānṛtavibhāvanāḥ |
N20.007e/ vādino 'numatenainaṁ kārayen nānyathā budhaḥ || 7 ||
N20.008a/ caturhastau tulāpādāv ucchrayeṇa prakīrtitau |
N20.008c/ ṣaḍḍhastaṁ tu tayor dṛṣṭaṁ pramāṇaṁ parimāṇataḥ || 8 ||
N20.009a/ pādayor antaraṁ hastaṁ bhaved adhyardham eva ca |
N20.009c/ śikyadvayaṁ samāsajya dhaṭe karkaṭake dṛḍhe || 9 ||
N20.010a/ tulayitvā naraṁ pūrvaṁ cihnaṁ kuryād dhaṭasya tu |
N20.010c/ kakṣāsthānena taṁ tulyam avatārya tato dhaṭāt || 10 ||
N20.011a/ samayaiḥ parigṛhyainaṁ punar āropayen naraḥ |
N20.011c/ tasminn evaṁ kṛte sā cet kakṣe sthāpya suniścalā || 11 ||
N20.012a/ tulito yadi vardheta śuddhaḥ syān nātre saṁśayaḥ |
N20.012c/ samo vā hīyamāno vā na viśuddho bhaven naraḥ || 12 ||
N20.013a/ dharmaparyāyavacanair dhaṭa ity abhidhīyase |
N20.013c/ tvaṁ vetsi sarvabhūtānāṁ pāpāni sukṛtāni ca |
N20.013e/ tvam eva dhaṭa jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ || 13 ||
N20.014a/ vyavahārābhiśasto 'yaṁ mānuṣas tulyate tathā |
N20.014c/ tad eva saṁśayāpannaṁ dharmatas trātum arhasi || 14 ||
N20.015a/ ata ūrdhvaṁ pravakṣyāmi lohasya vidhim uttamam |
N20.015c/ dvātriṁśadaṅgulāni tu maṇḍalān maṇḍalāntaram || 15 ||
N20.016a/ aṣṭābhir maṇḍalair evam aṅgulānāṁ śatadvayam |
N20.016c/ caturviṁśat samākhyātaṁ saṅkhyātattvārthadarśibhiḥ || 16 ||
N20.017a/ kalpitair maṇḍalair evam uṣitasya śucer api |
N20.017c/ saptāśvatthasya pattrāṇi sūtreṇāveṣṭya hastayoḥ || 17 ||
N20.018a/ vidadhyāt taptalohasya pañcāśatpalam sammitam |
N20.018c/ hastābhyāṁ piṇḍam ādāya śanaiḥ saptapadaṁ vrajet || 18 ||
N20.019a/ na maṇḍalam atikrāmen nāpy arvāk pādayet padam |
N20.019c/ na ca pātayetāprāptaḥ yāvadbhūmir prakalpitā || 19 ||
N20.020a/ tīrtvānena vidhānena maṇḍalāni samāhitaḥ |
N20.020c/ adagdhaḥ sarvato yas tu sa viśuddho bhaven naraḥ || 20 ||
N20.021a/ bhayād vā pātayate yas tv adagdho yo vibhāvyate |
N20.021c/ punas taṁ hārayel lohaṁ sthitir eṣā purātanī |
N20.021e/ anena vidhinā kāryo hutāśasamayaḥ smṛtaḥ || 21 ||
N20.022a/ tvam agne sarvabhūtānām antaścarasi sākṣivat |
N20.022c/ sukṛtaṁ duḥkṛtaṁ lokenājñātaṁ vidyate tvayā || 22 ||
N20.023a/ pracchannāni manuṣyāṇāṁ pāpāni sukṛtāni ca |
N20.023c/ yathāvad eva jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ || 23 ||
N20.024a/ vyavahārābhiśasto 'yaṁ puruṣaḥ śuddhim icchati |
N20.024c/ tad enaṁ saṁśayāpannaṁ dharmatas trātum arhasi || 24 ||
N20.025a/ ataḥ paraṁ pravakṣyāmi toyasya vidhim uttamam |
N20.025c/ nātikrūreṇa dhanuṣā prerayet sāyakatrayam || 25 ||
N20.026a/ madhyamas tu śaro grāhyaḥ puruṣeṇa yavīyasā |
N20.026c/ pratyānītasya tasyātha sa viśuddho bhaven naraḥ || 26 ||
N20.027a/ anyathā na viśuddhaḥ syād ekāṅgam api darśayet |
N20.027c/ sthānād anyatra vā gacched yasmin pūrvaṁ niveṣitaḥ || 27 ||
N20.028a/ striyas tu na balāt kāryā na pumān api durbalaḥ |
N20.028c/ bhīrutvād yoṣito mṛtyuḥ kṛśasyāpi balāt kuryāt |
N20.028e/ sahasā prāpnuyāt sarvāṁs tasmād etān na majjayet || 28 ||
N20.029/ toyamadhye manuṣyasya gṛhītvorū susaṁyataḥ || 29
N20.030a/ satyānṛtavibhāgasya toyāgnī spaṣṭakṛttamau |
N20.030c/ yataś cāgnir abhūd asmāt tatas toyaṁ viśiṣyate || 30 ||
N20.031a/ kriyate dharmatattvajñair dūṣitānāṁ viśodhanam |
N20.031c/ tasmāt satyena bhagavañ jaleśa trātum arhasi || 31 ||
N20.032a/ ataḥ paraṁ pravakṣyāmi viṣasya vidhim uttamam |
N20.032c/ tulayitvā viṣaṁ pūrvaṁ deyam etad dhimāgame || 32 ||
N20.033a/ na pūrvāhṇe na madhyāhne na sandhyāyāṁ tu dharmavit |
N20.033c/ śaradgrīṣmavasanteṣu varṣāsu ca na dāpayet || 33 ||
N20.034a/ bhagnaṁ ca dāritaṁ caiva dhūpitaṁ miśritaṁ tathā |
N20.034c/ kālakūṭam alambuṁ ca viṣaṁ yatnena varjayet || 34 ||
N20.035a/ śārṅgahaimavataṁ śastaṁ gandhavarṇarasānvitam |
N20.035c/ mahādoṣavate deyaṁ rājñā tattvabubhutsayā || 35 ||
N20.036a/ na bālāturavṛddheṣu naiva svalpāparādhiṣu |
N20.036c/ viṣasya tu yavān sapta dadyāc chodye ghṛtaplutān || 36 ||
N20.037a/ viṣasya palaṣaḍbhāgād bhāgo viṁśatimas tu yaḥ |
N20.037c/ tam aṣṭabhāgahīnaṁ tu śodhye dadyād ghṛtaplutam || 37 ||
N20.038a/ yathoktena vidhānena viprān sprṣṭvānumoditaḥ |
N20.038c/ sopavāsaś ca khādeta devabrāhmaṇasannidhau || 38 ||
N20.039a/ viṣaṁ vegaklamāpetaṁ sukhena yadi jīryate |
N20.039c/ viśuddham iti taṁ jñātvā rājā satkṛtya mokṣayet || 39 ||
N20.040a/ tvaṁ viṣa brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ satyadharmaratau sthitaḥ |
N20.040c/ śodhayainaṁ naraṁ pāpāt satyenāsyāmṛtībhava || 40 ||
N20.041/ ataḥ paraṁ pravakṣyāmi kośasya vidhim uttamam || 41 ||
N20.042a/ pūrvāhṇe sopavāsasya snātasyārdrapaṭasya ca |
N20.042c/ saśūkasyāvyasaninaḥ kośapānaṁ vidhīyate || 42 ||
N20.043a/ yadbhaktaḥ so 'bhiyuktaḥ syāt taddaivatyaṁ tu pāyayet |
N20.043c/ saptāhād yasya dṛśyate dvisaptāhena vā punaḥ |
N20.043e/ pratyātmikaṁ tu yatkiñcit saiva tasya vibhāvanā || 43 ||
N20.044a/ dvisaptāhāt paraṁ yasya mahad vā vaikṛtaṁ bhavet |
N20.044c/ nābhiyojyaḥ sa viduṣāṁ kṛtakālavyatikramāt || 44 ||
N20.045a/ mahāparādhe nirdharme kṛtaghne klībakutsite |
N20.045c/ nāstikavrātyadāseṣu kośapānaṁ vivarjayet || 45 ||
N20.046a/ yathoktena prakāreṇa pañca divyāni dharmavit |
N20.046c/ dadyād rājābhiyuktānāṁ pretya ceha ca nandati || 46 ||
N20.047a/ na viṣaṁ brāhmaṇe dadyān na lohaṁ kṣatriyo haret |
N20.047c/ na nimajjyāpsu vaiśyaś ca śūdraḥ kośaṁ na pāyayet || 47 ||
N20.048a/ varṣāsu na viṣaṁ dadyāt hemante nāpsu majjayet |
N20.048c/ na lohaṁ hārayed grīṣme na kośaṁ pāyayen niśi || 48 ||
nāradīyadharmaśāstraḥ samāptaḥ
